story:
Beyond Nuts.

Okay, first check out this glamor shot of the premium glazed and spiced nuts we're working on.  (They actually taste even better than they look.)  Can you think of a more ideal snack or holiday gift?

Now, think about this.  Would you believe that more people in the world are now displaced from their homes than at any time since WW2?

That's about 60 million people. That means one out of every 120 of us on the planet has been torn away from what they care the most about: home, family, work, community, language, culture.  That’s way beyond nuts.  Without doubt it is one of the crucial moral issues of our times that should demand our attention.  Yet for many of us it seems far away.  And what can you or I do about it anyhow?

(Refugee Camp in Surac, Turkey)

Making granola to hire refugees.

About seven years ago we decided we'd try to do something, even it if was tiny. So we started a granola company. 

We knew that the few refugees resettling in our state (about 150-250 per year) were having a terrible time finding their first jobs.  So we decided that every employee in our company would be a refugee and every position would be paid job training.  

We started making the most delicious, healthy, all-natural granola we could.  We built relationships.  We told stories.  We opened a web store and began sending granola everywhere.  We set up booths at farmers markets where customers could buy granola and have a conversation with a refugee.  Our idea was to add incredible value to a delicious, nourishing product by producing it in way that changes people's lives right in our own state and city. 

A nutty idea? Sure. The really nutty thing was that it worked. To date, we've provided training for over 40 refugees and almost every one of them has gone on to a better job.  Along the way we became our state's premier granola maker with stores in MA and CT starting to pick us up.  One bag or bar at a time, we're helping consumers have a small but personal stake in refugee resettlement and the lives of individual refugees.  And now we've set our sights on designing our company as a model for refugee job development which could be replicated in other refugee communities across the US and beyond.

Our nutty new campaign.

Just two years ago, with the help of 135 partners in our first Indiegogo campaign we launched a new product (granola bars) and grew our business.

We now feel ready to grow again.  In fact, within the next year we've set our sights on helping 20 refugees move into the job market. 

So what better way to make our nuttiness official than to officially go into nuts? Spiced nuts, that is. We’ve been working on prototypes. Thinly glazed with honey and a flavor that will knock your socks off. There's nothing on the market quite like them.

Since we're a partnership-minded non-profit, crowdfunding is an ideal way for us to move forward.  We get your input and support.  You get a stake in a mission that matters.  Together we'll perfect a delicious product that we'll all be proud of and that will introduce many thousands more to a concern for refugees. 

How we'll use the money.

Launching a new premium product is never cheap. 

We plan to use the funding to upgrade our packaging system equipment (for all our products) in order to include lot numbers and dates. 

We will design professional packaging and labels that will better communicate the amazing story of refugees and resettlement. 

Most importantly, we will jump start production, and the training and marketing that goes with it.  This is how our growth cycle works: the only way we can expand our training program is by first expanding sales and production.  While much of the money we raise will go directly into making nuts and getting them out to you and your friends, your support will give us the much needed flexibility to get our production up to speed and will introduce our product to a large number of people in time for the holiday season.

The perks: what's in it for you? 

Our perks are all ways to emphasize our priorities.

First, you'll get involved.  You'll share in our mission and hear our employees' stories. Few people realize it when refugees are settling right in their city. We want to change that. In a campaign like this, the number of contributors matter.  You can donate without a perk.  Even if you can only give one dollar, we'd love to have you on our team with a stake in this mission. There are a lot more important things than money.
Second, you'll be among the first to enjoy our nuts, and along with them the satisfaction of knowing you helped launch a new kind of product with an important mission behind it.  And you'll have a chance to share them with all your friends.
Third, you can be part of perfecting the product.  Big corporations have their focus groups.  We think we can do better by gathering a team Product Developers to sample our prototypes and advise us on perfecting them. You get to be the first to taste, and the last to have a say in the final version. Help us get ready to put them on the shelves!

Other ways to help.

We know that not everyone can contribute monetarily to our cause. HOWEVER, there are more ways than one to go nuts in supporting our job training project for refugees. 
Find out what's happening in refugee resettlement in your city.  It's easier than you might imagine to visit and get to know a refugee family.  If you live in RI, you can always volunteer with us.  We can often use the extra hands! Contact us at info@beautifuldayri.com.
A campaign like this lives or dies on the basis of its reach--primarily through social media.   Share the campaign through Facebook, Twitter, email, and good ol' fashioned word of mouth. Spread the word to your family and friends that don't know about us.

Visit our website site and blog and learn more about our mission at: www.beautifuldayri.org
And be sure to follow our progress over the next six weeks. We sincerely thank you for your support!
Special thanks go out to Cory Louis for his work on our video and Linsey Lerner for her photography!

story:
Let us make Good Deed Eatery a push up for someone! 


The story of my idea

I was born into a poor, rural family and I remember my childhood: I was hungry and cold.

There was no heating or electricity at home, and we had nothing to eat either.

When I was hungry and cold I could only dream about a plate of warm food. Not only me, but my whole family was dreaming too. And we often chatted about food and we were planning on what we would eat when we would have something...

But I grew up and I grew into a determined adult who has always been sympathetic with the less fortunate. Reaching adulthood I joined building groups and became their cook on assignments in Europe. I was given a shy budget and told to cook something delicious and filling for a group of grown up hungry men. And I did it for years!

I grew into the job, learnt tricks and techniques and I've always thrived to provide nutritious, delicious and, of course, plenty of food for them.

It was great to see how much they appreciated my meals. They were grateful that someone has provided them with dinner after a long day's work. During the years I received positive feedback and encouragement to carry on with cooking. So I landed in London and carried on with my work in various kitchens. It didn't take a long time to get horrified – the amount of food going into waste is just unspeakable. I've seen still in date and good food being thrown out routinely only because there was too much.

After several countries in Europe there has been something unchanged here, in London. Then and even now, every day I see homeless people on the streets...and people try to look away. Is it because of disdain? Ignorance? Disgust? Or simply because they don't want to see, notice or care with others' suffering? I do not know, I cannot see others' thoughts or souls. But I cannot and will not walk away from or ignore them. They are there, weather or not we like it. They are humans, just like you and me. The difference is they have less fortune than others.


I want to help these people with your generosity.

Growing up as a poor kid taught me to respect food and I have never thrown out food. NEVER. And it will remain like this!

We take it for granted that the fridge is always full, or there is at least something to nibble on when you are hungry, but it is not always the case! There are people who have empty fridges at the end of the month or may not even have fridges. Everyday people in the world go hungry for reasons out of their control. For these people, may them be elderly, homeless, a big family, or simply those who are facing difficulties, one meal could mean the world. They will have their hearts warmed up or get some hope.

I know only too well what it means to be hungry! That's why I am asking for your help. Help me to be able to help those who have nothing or very little to eat.

For hungry people every bite counts. So does every penny with what I can help to make my goal.

I want to offer them a chance by creating an eatery. A special one!

Together we can make a difference.

So what's the idea?

Our set menu will consist of some freshly made classics and favourites.

Every day on top of these we will cook 6 simple, delicious and nutritious different dishes – two appetizers, two mains and two desserts.  These will change every day for two weeks, then repeated. The menus will be published in advance. Everyone will find their favourites, including vegetarians.

Of course, the dishes will be reviewed periodically and will be adjusted according to popularity.

We will only use good quality products to create our dishes. We have already identified a good one for meat – the company sources many restaurants in the UK.

And we are on the lookout for more reliable and excellent suppliers.

Our 2 or 3 course nutritious and delicious meal will be available for everyone, even for those on a tight budget.

The only secret lies in the food – the food we create makes it possible to produce excellent quality meals for a lot of people. Cooking in bulk makes it possible to reduce individual costs so everyone will be able to afford our freshly made dishes.

The origin of the name

Our principle is based on good deeds and we are going to have several ways how us and our customers can show it:

  • We will not throw out good food! Whatever is left after each day is just an extra plate for someone. These extras will be donated to the homeless, local shelters or families who are in need – and it only takes a little to produce enough to surely have some extra dishes. We won't use the same food the following day, so why throwing it out when we can make a difference in others' lives and every days.
  • Our guests will be able to purchase extra dishes, meals or tip whatever amount of donations. These will go towards producing more on the following day so we will have more extra to give away.
  • When we start to select our staff we will advertise our positions at homeless shelters. So we are going to give them a chance to start working with us and hopefully, start a new life.
  • We have other ideas and in time we will introduce those too.

What will be the money used for:



Let us make hearty food to make a difference. With your help all this can be brought to life!

He may also be dreaming of a warm meal...

story:
Ayúdanos A CONSTRUIR UNA ESCUELA PARA NIÑOS CON CANCER QUE SE VEN EN LA NECESIDAD DE ABANDONARLA EN SUS LUGARES DE ORIGEN POR VENIR A GUADALAJARA A TOMAR SUS TERAPIAS.   

NO LOS DEJEMOS RENDIRSE!
NO PERMITAMOS QUE LA ABANDONEN! 
AYUDANOS A CUIDARLOS & DEJANOS AYUDARTE A ENTREGARLES TU AYUDA!
Nariz Roja (www.narizroja.org) es una institución no lucrativa fundada por Alejandro Barbosa (Facebook: Alejandro Barbosa Padilla) hace 5 años, quien ha sido -según las propias palabras de los niños y sus familiares- un verdadero angel en sus vidas. 
Esta maravillosa organización brinda albergue, alimentos, servicios de lavandería y regaderas a los niños y sus familiares... y este año, con la ayuda de todos podrán además disfrutar de su nueva escuela!!! 
Te invito a que pongas tu granito de arena -literalmente- en este gran proyecto, desde hacer voluntariado, donativos en especie o colaborar en esta campaña de recolección de fondos y les demos la oportunidad de tener no solo una buena educación, sino la alegría que el saber conlleva, la alegría de aprender, de convivir, de crecer!!!
Dentro de todo el sufrimiento que ellos pueden tener a causa de su enfermedad, ten por seguro que nos pueden dar infinidad de enseñanzas a su corta edad.. brindémosles un poco de alegría y ayudemos -desde donde estemos- a construir bellos recuerdos y bellos momentos, esperando que el día que estén completamente sanos, si es la voluntad de Dios, puedan reincorporarse por completo a sus escuelas en sus lugares de origen sin haber perdido ningún año escolar, sin haber dejado de estudiar. 
JUNTOS LO PODEMOS LOGRAR!!
$1 USD  es suficiente!
Si cada uno de los que le damos click a esta campaña donamos $1 USD estoy segura que lo conseguiremos!
¿Qué necesitamos? 
  • $10,000 USD para terminar la construcción de la escuela 
  • $15,000 USD para el equipamiento y funcionamiento de la escuela 
CONFIO EN USTEDES!! JUNTOS LO PODEMOS LOGRAR!!!
CUALQUIER DONATIVO HARÁ LA DIFERENCIA EN LA VIDA DE NUESTROS NIÑOS, SERA UN GRAN REGALO QUE PODRA CAMBIAR SUS VIDAS!
Qué más puedo hacer?

Si quires seguir apoyando a nuestros niños durante todo el año, puedes escoger cualquiera de estas actividades:

  • Convertirte en benefactor
  • Convertirte en donador de sangre (requisitos también en narizroja.org)
  • Hacer tus propias campañas monetarias, de alimentos, etc. en tu comunicad (iglesia, escuela, colonia, amigos, etc) entregarlo en Toluca 689. Guadalajara, Jalisco. C.P. 44360. 
  • Compartir la campaña con tus amigos y familiares (facebook, twitter, mail, etc.)
CHECA LOS AVANCES DE LA ESCUELA:
 https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.10153080788857058.1073741990.252167987057&type=3
=====================================
EN MIS PROPIAS PALABRAS...
                                                                     XIMENA
======================================
YOU CAN HELP US TO BUILD A SCHOOL  FOR MANY KIDS THAT HAVE CANCER THAT COME FROM PLACES FAR FROM GUADALAJARA TO TAKE THEIR TREATMENT AND FOR THAT REASON THEY HAVE TO DROP OFF SCHOOL....
DON´T LET THEM QUIT
HELP US TAKE CARE OF THEM!
& LET US HANDLE YOUR HELP TO THEM!
Nariz Roja (www.narizroja.org) is an non-profit organization founded 5 years ago, thanks to the enthusiasm of Alejandro Barbosa  (Facebook: Alejandro Barbosa Padilla), an "angel" according the kids and their parents words, that helps them.. but mostly loves all of them!!
This great organization provides shelter, food, laundry and bathroom services for families that comes to Guadalajara for their kids treatment and in this year we are expanding the operations also to provide the kids the opportunity to continue with their education building a school for them!!
I encourage you to help all this kids and give them the opportunity not just to have a better education, but also to have happy memories in between the suffering they have, new peers to know, new worlds to know... to open their mind and imagination!!
This can change their life and they will be grateful with you forever!!
So please, HELP US MAKE IT HAPPEN!! 
$1 USD is enough if each of you want to help....together we can do it!!! 

What do we need? 
  • $10,000 USD for finishing the school construction
  • $15,000 USD for operating the school (hiring teachers, material, some furniture that is missing, and so on)
I trust you guys  and I know we can make it together!!
PLEASE ANY DONATION WILL COUNT, ANY DONATION IS A GIFT THAT CAN CHANGE THEIR LIVES

What else can I do?

If you want to keep helping the kids you can either choose one (or all) of this ways:

  • Be a benefactor
  • Be a blood donor
  • Make food/money campaigns in your community and send the money to Nariz Roja trough the web page
  • and please: SHARE THE CAMPAIGN!! (facebook, twitter, mail and so on)
===================================== PORQUE QUEREMOS UNA ESCUELA NR?

story:
Who We Are 

Hello my name is Michele and I run the Apothecary shop in Cardiff.  We sell a wide selection of beautiful teas, chocolates and gifts, as well as combining our complimentary health centre.

The shop has been open for just over a year and now we are ready to expand it a little bit more with a Tea Room!

With your help we can create a unique and special place to meet, socialise and indulge in some of the finest teas, and cakes.

Since we opened we have held a series of events at the shop for customers to come in and meet like minded people. They have always been incredibly popular and the thing people have always said to us is “this is great you should open a tea room” so that’s what we are doing!

What We Need & What You Get

We are reaching out to our customers, friends and community to join us and be a part of the Apothecary Tea Room. The team room will be located within the shop and we have already done a lot of the building work.

We are looking to raise £5,000 to help us buy extra kitchen equipment, and improved lighting.

We want you to know how much we appreciate you supporting us and so we have put together some very special "perks" for you!

We only have limited numbers of each one, but don't worry we will be introducing more perks throughout the campaign. You can also get perks for friends or loved ones sent to them from us with love! 

These below our the launch early bird specials for you. But remember when they are gone, they are gone! 

£5 A selection of delicious Rococo Chocolates

£10 A special thank you with our favorite tea and chocolate

£25  Limited Edition Signature Treat yourself (Ladies) gift set

£25 Limited Edition Signature Treat yourself (Gentlemen) gift set

£25 Limited Edition Signature Tea for me gift basket

£25 Limited Edition Chocolate Divine gift basket 

£40  Your name on a plaque on a chair plus tea for two with  cake 

£50 Early Bird Afternoon tea for two 

£50 Tea for a year | A free cup of tea of your choice every week for a year 

£100 Your name will go on the new wall of fame, luxury gift set and invite to our soft opening  

All your donations will go towards making the Apothecary Tea Room a unique and special place! Even if we do not reach our full goal all the money we raise will go towards kitchen equipment.
 
Your contributions will mean so much to me as it will help us get a commercial fridge, a drinks cooler a commercial dishwasher and improved lighting. Without your help we wouldn't be able to do this so please help make our tea room happen!.

Other Ways You Can Help

There are other ways you can help us too! Sharing our posts on Facebook and Twitter, spreading the word about this campaign as well as about the tea rooms!

story:
About Us


Hey guys, thank you so much for taking the time out to view our campaign!

We are 'Team Events On Demand' a bunch of events and marketing fanatics. Priscilla is the founder, who graduated from the University of the Creative Arts in 2012. She is also known as 'Miss Flower Power' a real lover of all things that grow and blossom. Irina is currently studying Events Management and has that sparkle in her eye for the creative arts. Leila holds two legal degrees under her belt and is currently doing a MA In Business Law. She is a belly full of laughter, innovative and always solution focused to get everyone smiling again.

Events On Demand is for the community. We want local everyday people, small businesses and freelancers to be recognised in our communities, and we support this idea by having a marketplace of service providers including photographers, DJ's, venue owners (like small coffee shops), caterers/food bloggers, musician and artist (as you'll read more below in the 'Solution' section). EOD’s marketplace of service providers is opening new employment opportunities in the freelance and small business industry. As 3 girls from Deptford ourselves, we know at first hand experience what it's like to come from inner city areas. So we are also focusing our CSR on programmes based on building a better future for the younger generation in deprived communities (Read more in 'Impact and Vision' section below).

We would love for you too, to share this journey with us. Please back us and check out the 'Perks' section! 


What is EOD?

Events On Demand is a One-Stop-Shop for the creative events industry. Event-Seekers can find interesting things to do in whatever area they are in either through our website or app. This includes Service Providers such as venue owners, caterers, photographer, DJ's and Creative freelancers/small businesses who list their services and price and manage their availability. Event Organisers can create their event from scratch easily, collaborating with Service Providers from EOD's marketplace, they can also sell their tickets and utilise the promotional tools to market their event.


Problem

Too often enough people are either looking for things to do in their community, local areas or extended areas. Interestingly, there is so many events going on everywhere, yet people don't know about it. As event organisers ourselves, we discovered so many issues including (this is just a small list):

  • Finding a platform of people to organize events and collaborate with. People, communities and businesses want to participate on events and projects.

  • Finding an event website that provides effective marketing tools with competitive price transparency. Although social media and printing promotional flyers is useful, it still remains inadequate. Just imagine spending your hard earned cash on flyers. You hand them out, only to find that your targeted audience has thrown it on the floor... ouch!

  • Many people and small businesses who hold events are not professional marketers. So existing marketing tools are ineffective for someone who is starting out in the events industry.


Solution

Events On Demand will be the Virtual village for event lovers, event organisers and service providers


Events On Demand has created a simple to use self-service marketing platform (tailored specifically for events only) for anyone to use including beginners. We will be the number 1 destination where you will be able to do the following:

Event Organiser:

(Get your event easily noticed in the right place and collaborate with others)

+ host an existing event.

+ create an event from scratch.

+ find collaborators including Venues, DJ’s, caterers, photographers and more to feature in your event.

+ select from EOD’s efficient and effective promotional tools to generate more awareness and ticket sales for their event.

+ post an event idea and allow service providers the ability to request collaboration with event organisers.


Service Provider:

(Make extra profit and increase awareness about your services)

+ host their services.

+ set their prices.

+ accept or decline bookings or requests.


Event Seeker:

(No need to search for events anymore)

+ discover events in their area or specific locations.

+ discover event through the promotional tools.

+ discover event through a ‘Yes’, ‘Maybe’ and ‘No’ suggestion software.

+ search for events.

+ buy tickets.


Expenses

  • Staff: £47,000 web development cost to hire a London based software agency 'Studio Graphene' who specialises with working with Start Up companies: The team who will be working on the development will consist of Front End Developer, Back End Developer, UI Designer, Software Tester (Quality Assurance) and Project Manager.

  • Marketing: £20,000. We have devised a very strong marketing strategy to reach our customers, including: SEO Marketing, Social Media Advertising, EOD's branded oyster cardholder (which will be distributed at a number of London Stations), EOD's carnival blow horns (which will be distributed at a number of events including carnival and festivals).

  • Perks: £3,000 will cover the cost for: buying all the perks and rewards supplies.

Impact & Vision

Events on Demand is a business for the community and for our livelihood... everything we do comes back to our purpose, which is to ‘Create Amazing Experiences’ within the  local community. More then that, it is here to remind us that we need to focus our time on more important things in life, taking control of our lives, regarding our freedom to create good memories and togetherness. Event on Demand will become a new way of creating events, where people with any level of experience and education will be able to organise and promote their event. Moreover, Events on Demand will create many jobs for representatives of creative industry such as graphic designers, musicians, actors, photographers other freelancers and small businesses. By crowdfunding EOD, you are investing in a company, which is aiming to bring more opportunities to people to go to interesting, unique and educational places, making event creation process available to a variety of people and bringing art and expression events to a mass market level. In such city as London, where everyday millions events take place Events On Demand has a demand.

Events On Demand will allow us to also focus programmes on building a brighter future for talented young people from inner cities aged between 14 - 18, who have experienced financial hardship growing up / who may have underachieved at secondary school / college level and would greatly benefit from working alongside the EOD family. 45% of young people do not achieve the national standard at GCSE.
Underachievement correlates with unemployment, which correlates with low well-being (data from ONS). This is why EOD will have roles in marketing, design, events management and administration (and that's just the start as we grow!)
We will help fulfil their strengths, connect and network with fantastic people, and help them build a great start to their career.

Challenges & Opportunities

As any new company, we have plenty of challenges in regards to investments, building customer awareness and actually running the business. However, we prefer to look at the positive side of things, as nothing worth having comes easy, and many well established companies were at the same place we’re in.
Once Events On Demand is up and running, we will be able to expand our services on national and possibly international scale.  Events On Demand has a great opportunity of becoming the number one event’s and collaboration platform in the UK. In the near future, we are planning to expand our services to individuals and businesses outside the creative event industry.

Perks

...'SPEECHLESS' perk

(We couldn't finish off the 'Speechless' perk as we ran out of word count) but you will also get an exclusive holiday for you and a friend, to go Paris for 2 weeks because we love you!

We also have a number of great perks, but we think the Plant Kit perk is very special. For every plant that someone buys, it symbolises that we are growing our business together. We find it very important that we are backed by communities and small businesses and everyday people, as this is what represents who Events On Demand is.  There are a number of great perks, including goody bags tailored for Event Organisers, Service Provider and Event Seekers. You can also get our EOD jumper available in multiple sizes and colours in White, Black, Yellow, Orange and Grey. (Just email us your size and colour)


Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Make some noise about our campaign and spread the word to your friends, family, community, network of colleagues and business contacts.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign on your social media!
  • Hashtag your post with one of the following:

#letsbringthiscommunitybusinesstolife #eventsondemand #teameod or #teameventsondemand


Thank you!

Check out our social media to find out more info about these amazing people who featured in our video!

We also have a number of great perks, but we think the Plant Kit perk is very special. For every plant that someone buys, it symbolises that we are growing our business together. We find it very important that we are backed by communities and small businesses and everyday people, as this is what represents who Events On Demand is.  There are a number of great perks, including goody bags tailored for Event Organisers, Service Provider and Event Seekers. You can also get our EOD jumper available in multiple sizes and colours in White, Black, Yellow, Orange and Grey. (Just email us your size and colour)Other Ways You Can Help We know that some people may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help: 
Make some noise about our campaign and spread the word to your friends, family, community, network of colleagues and business contacts.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign on your social media!
Hashtag your post with one of the following:
#letsbringthiscommunitybusinesstolife #eventsondemand #teameod or #teameventsondemandThank you!Check out our social media to find out more info about these amazing people who featured in our video!

story:
Algae for a better future

Algae are fascinating organisms and a substantial part of our ecosystem's balance. The functional foods and supplements we are developing with Uira BioenergEthic are relying on the power of microalgae, fed by wastewater and energy from sunlight.

There is an increasing global demand for high value functional foods and nutraceuticals like Omega 3 from plant sources. Currently, most of the supply for those products is depending on animal sources and their production is running on fossil fuels, exploiting and polluting the Earth’s resources at the same time.

To improve our diet and living healthy lives motivates us to take action and to found  Uira BioenergEthic.




Why we need your help

We chose to rely on a crowdfunding campaign because we want to keep our corporate structure consistent and organic. 

We believe that your support is necessary since the day one to provide healthier nutrition for everyone.


What you should know about Algae functional foods and supplements

Functional foods are a new concept in nutrition. 

By definition, functional foods and supplements have properties similar to medicines.

According to the scientific communities our nutrition has the most important role fr our hea

Omega 3 fatty acids



Humans developed on diets consisting of marine life, wild game and/or inland plants.

This type of diet provided sufficient Omega-3 fats, which resulted in an Omega-6/Omega-3 ratio that was around 1:1.

The current Western Countries diet provides a ratio that is around 16 to 20:1 (Omega-6:Omega-3). 

This is likely due to the shift in dietary staples, which generally do not include foods like flax, hemp, walnuts, perilla, green leafy veggies, chia, fish and algae.



The essential fats from algae may improve fatty acid balance and health benefits:

  • Cardiovascular function
  • Nervous system function
  • Immunity
  • Memory & concentration
  • Mood
  • Neurotransmission
  • Insulin sensitivity & nutrient partitioning
  • Body composition


Algae versus Fish Omega 3 fatty acids:

 “Because DHA is the active component for lowering triglycerides, for bioavailability to the brain and organs, and all Omega-3s can be made from DHA.

Algae oil is more concentrated in Omega-3s and in DHA and is thus better formulated for human metabolism.”

Dr. Scott Doughman - Biochemist and Algae Researcher


Comic art by Michelle Weirathmueller


What you get

To provide you with a short term reward we designed eco-friendly gadgets exclusively for this campaign to thank you for your contribution!

Check out the details in the perks section.


How Algae can help us

Life on Planet Earth started with microscopic cyanobacteria performing photosynthesis. 

Microalgae play a substantial role to keep the fine balance of our Planet’s ecosystem.

Scientific, industrial and consumer interest in natural compounds potent health effects, has promoted the explosion of research, commercial and marketing opportunities in relation to the development of functional foods and nutraceuticals  derived from algae.

The growing importance of this expanding and dynamic area is the result of different trends in relation to the environmental, economic , health and social concerns including the demand for natural ingredients with novel biological properties , the development of sustainable clean industrial processes and the need to valorise algal biomass as a worldwide available, abundant and renewable resource.

The nitty gritty:

  • Operation start–up within a Lab doing R&D and products development
  • Lab and equipment rent
  • Equipment and pilot plant facility design 
  • Technology and IP development (photobioreactors, harvesting system, dewatering system, oil extraction system and manufacturing system)
  • Equipment costruction
  • Marketing and Communication expenses

Risks & Challenges

Our organisation is committed to the proper use and stewardship of natural resources. That's the idea behind the term "BioenergEthic" which we created to encapsulate our vision.

Our processes draw on natural nutrients in an ethical, sustainable way. We believe this approach will result in a company dedicated to the pursuit of a better planet and in turn, a better organisation.

However, what distinguishes us from other organisations are the challenges we are facing by using wastewater streams and CO2 from the atmosphere.

This technology is innovative and challenging.

We have prototypes for photo-bioreactors and harvesting systems that have to be tested on large scale.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute financially, please help us to spread the word and make some noise about our campaign.

Tell your friends, family, colleagues and pets ;-) as well.

It will be truly appreciated.

THANK YOU

story:
Three former Master students in International Sports Management at the Johan Cruyff Institute (Amsterdam, the Netherlands) set up the Foundation Onemilliongoals during their study.


They believe that, by scoring a goal, being in the spotlight and being known, a child would feel like a true world champion. This memory will have a positive effect on their development.

Something so simple can be something so unique.

One million goals equal one million happy children. Who doesn’t want that?

They could actually achieve this goal, but not without your help! It´s amazing what we could achieve with your donation! Want to join? Then help us achieve this goal and be part of the legacy!


What do we need?

We need you! That’s obvious.. But why do we need you?

It’s quite simple.. If you donate, we are able to create this positive memory for one million children.

As we are a non-profit foundation, all of our revenues will be directly put into achieving our goal.

To reach our goal (one million children), we eventually need $25.000.000!

That’s one million donors paying $25 and giving one million children this opportunity!

Sponsors will help us during our campaign with exposure, attributes and other contributions to enhance the experience.

For this Indiegogo campaign, we need $25.000 to build our framework and being able to start with our first events, so we could give the first 1000 children this amazing experience!

You as a backer, could help us reaching this $25.000, by choosing one of the perks.


Why donate with us?

There are thousands and thousands of foundations, organizations and other projects providing a sustainable contribution to society. Each single one of them focused on their own specific area.

Most organizations provide something tangible, like food packages, shelter for refugees, water wells etc. All by all important. We believe that with our foundation, we are creating two things important;

1. a lifetime memory, which will have a positive effect on the development of those children involved.

2. binding one million children, no matter where they are coming from, and give them the opportunity to belong to this large group.

As the positive moments with a large impact in childhood, partially determine the development of a child. We believe that those children involved within our foundation, will be provided with a goal in life. Scoring a goal, be part of the one million all over the world. Be there (feel the moment) and being seen (recognition) will give children that goal in life. What differentiates us from others is the personal connection you as a donor will have. You will actually see the amazing moment you are donating for!

As children by nature, have a strong urge to belong to something, to be part of a group, to be connected with others. We give this opportunity. As being part of one of the one million children. You actually feel connected. If you score number #213.234 and #213.235 is scored by your ‘friend’ a thousand kilometers away from where you live, that bonds!


But what if you go over your $25.000

No worries there! Like said; we eventually need $25.000.000

We use this campaign to get our first events running (and create the first memories!)

If we earn more then our goal, we simply continue with our events!

But what if you can’t reach your goal?

Off course we believe that we can achieve our dream; one million goals.

One million goals, that’s a tremendous amount of children! How on earth are we ever going to reach all those kids, film them and (after developing) send our donors a special movie?

Not to mention, sending you a cool wristband with an unique number and make sure that every child gets to keep its ball.

But you know what…

We're so confident in achieving our goal that we can and will succeed!


So, do you believe in our goal? You could contribute to this story and become part of the legacy right now! 








Onemilliongoals is a foundation and a Non-Profit Organisation, officially registered in The Hague, The Netherlands by notarial act.

Our goal is to create a memory for one million children all over the world. We believe that this will have a positive effect on the development of the children involved.
Children between 6 and 14 years old all over the world will have an equal opportunity to be part of the group of one million children. No matter what colour, disability, gender, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation or cultural background.

story:
Short Summary

Eleni's Empanadas was establised while on maternity leave with our first son. It was a way for me to contribute to our growing family while exploring and developing my culinary skills. At first making empanadas was purely for the enjoyment at family gatherings; until one day my childhood friend offered to order my product for an event she was having for her own business. Now, three years and two boys later Eleni's Empanadas is an emerging catering business with customers from all over Southern Ontario. Aside from catering my empanadas to food lovers in the region I've had the opportunity to share my skills and knowledge of making these latino favourites for the great people of  Toronto in top tier food festivals as a Demo Chef. 

This campaign is to help raise money with automating my empanada production and to pay for rent of a commercial kitchen; so that I can go from delivering individual orders to delivering my empanadas to the masses at leading Food Festival and in community pop-up locations in Toronto. Right now I press each empanada shell individually and each empanada is handcrafted. When I have help with the assembly for a large order it takes two full days; that's only assembling 300 pieces. With automating the production of the empanada shells I can press out thousands of shells in minutes which will cut down on my production time and be able to provide my present and future customers with empanadas at a quicker lead time.

My goal is to bring Eleni's Empanadas to as many people as possible this summer and eventually set up a shop where customers can come in an enjoy my food. Every time I'm working on an order my son says in excitement, "Mommy we have a customer today!" I want my sons to be proud of their Mommy and create an Empanada Empire that they may prosper from when they are ready to contribute to society.

What We Need  

Currently, my production equipment consists of a food processor for making the dough, two cast iron empanada presses (different sizes) for pressing individual empanada shells and my hands for assembling. These all work well when I have manageable orders of 6 to 8 dozen. However, when I'm preparing a large order of 300+ pieces my food processor heats up too much with fear that it may have met its day. My body aches from pressing out so many pieces and then I have the challenge of storing and baking several sheets of my empanadas.

With the funding from Indiegogo, I will be able to purchase equipment necessary to automate my production and rent a commercial kitchen that has the capacity to store and bake my empanadas. The equipment I need to do that is an automatic empanada press, a commercial size food processor and mobile convection oven (for on site baking at Food Festivals). Also, I would need to rent out a commercial kitchen and hire someone full time to assist me with production. 

Automatic Empanada Press = $8000

Commericial Kitchen Rental for 2 months = $2880

Employee Cost for 2 months = $4800

Catering Materials = $320

What You Get

For your incredible generosity you will get a variety of perks. Every contributor will be fed well with my empanadas and other delicious Peruvian dishes. Some will be outfitted smartly with my custom designed aprons (inspired by Japanese apron pattern). Others will be recognized with your name on my menu; much like Thanksgiving contest winner - Georgina Tziavaras - Gee's Blueberry Bliss and Stavros Kottas - Kottas Classic Chicken

The Impact

Helping me raise money to grow my business will mean that my family will have a viable business with which to prosper from. In return you will help to bring Latino food closer to the good people of Toronto who love exploring food from exotic cultures.

Risks & Challenges

Without the generosity and support of contributors like you, my dreams of taking Eleni's Empanadas from being a one woman catering company to an empanada empire will be near impossible. Not too long ago, I had to turn down an offer to vend my empanadas at local charity event because I wasn't able to produce the amount I needed to sell to participate. I don't want that to happen again. The one thing I dislike is saying, "NO!" to opportunities. My hope is that the great people of Toronto and surrounding areas will enjoy my empanadas for every occasion, everywhere. With automating my empanada production I will be able to sell my product at various food festivals and pop-up locations because I will be able to produce more pieces in shorter amount of time. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Times are tough for all of us and I will totally understand if you can't be a financial supporter. It would fantastic if you could be a social media supporter and spread the word in the hopes that are others who can contribute to my campaign. Thank you for visiting my campaign and I look forward to meeting you at a Food Festival near you.

story:
Introduction

Introducing Qilotoa, the definitive solution for monitoring and analyzing advertising, media and social networks in Latin America, via the integration of the most advanced technologies available on the market.

After two years of research, Qilotoa was born as the definitive solution to meet all the needs of marketing, communication and public relations professionals by allowing them to find out what people are reading, listening to, watching and talking about.

Why Qilotoa?

Because it’s the solution to a problem we shared with thousands of professionals in the fields of advertising, public relations and communication around the world: how to find out what’s being said and broadcast about a brand, product or reputation across all media and in real time. Qilotoa offers a way to do this using a single platform that can be accessed via website, tablet and smartphone.

What does Qilotoa do exactly?

Qilotoa will allow them to know exactly what impact an investment in advertising and communication achieves and its audience reach across all types of media. What’s more, it will do so in a way that’s easy, modern and practically in real time.

Qilotoa offers a single solution providing direct, limitless access to all of the editorial mentions and advertising placements on TV, radio, in the press and online. 

Public relations and advertising, united for the first time in a single tool!

Qilotoa enriches this information with geolocated data regarding the impact on social networks. This makes it the most complete and advanced tool on the market.

Qilotoa also offers the unique function of specific “pre-trending topics” when it detects unusually high activity related to a specific subject.

Thanks to the use of advanced “Speech to Text” technology, Qilotoa offers users the opportunity to access mentions on TV and radio and even edit and distribute them instantly, without intermediaries and practically in real time, 24/7.

Qilotoa monitors how many times a brand appears on TV by using a modern recognition system for moving images.

Qilotoa analyses all of the editorial mentions, advertising placements and social network references, providing an integrated solution that will lower costs, lighten workloads and reduce errors by centralizing all the information within a single solution.

Qilotoa offers “all-inclusive” services to prevent surprises when there is a large volume of mentions in different types of media.

Qilotoa is a project developed by túatú social media & pr agency. It will be offered in Ecuador initially, but its scalable nature means it can quickly be offered to other countries in Latin America.

The methodology behind Qilotoa is the brainchild of Octavio Isaac Rojas Orduña, the founder of túatú Spain and túatú Ecuador and a public relations expert whose multicultural perspective has benefited over 200 clients in five different countries over the course of his 20-plus years in the industry. 

Contributions

  • Up to 90% of the funds collected will go directly to the deployment of the solution.
  • Since it is a B2B solution, we are offering perks related to the media and Ecuador.  It will be fun to support us!  You can get more than just an object, but maybe a lifetime experience.
  • In case we don't reach the goal here, we will keep looking for the funds. 
  • We are doing Qilotoa, period!

With the funds, túatú social media & pr agency, which has offices in both Spain and Ecuador, will accelerate the deployment of Qilotoa in Ecuador and subsequently bring it to other markets in Latin America.

Perks

Overcoming challenges

My name is Octavio Rojas, leader of Qilotoa's project, and today I’m asking you to help me move my project forward and help make my dream come true.

That dream is Qilotoa.

Nearly eight years ago, I explained the original vision for my project to someone who I respect a great deal, and he told me: “This is something you don’t know how to do. Dedicate yourself to what you do best”. I took his advice, and it proved to be sound. 

I’m grateful to this person, but more than two years ago, my journey through life caused me to return to my original vision. I started to refine the idea and carry out research. I built a team, found partners and spoke to people from all over the world, from the Americas to Asia via Europe and Central America. I shared my car and my house on Blablacar and Airbnb in order to finance my research trips. 

It’s been a long journey, and many people have supported me along the way, although there have also been those who’ve told me I should accept that I’ll never make this dream come true. 

But finally, one day I realized that my vision was not only possible, but could even go further. It was a fantastic feeling.

To make my project a reality, to make my dream come true, I’ll need help. 

I’m so excited about this project, and I’m contacting you because I want to make my professional vision a reality, to make my dream come true; a dream for which I’ve mortgaged my house, invested my savings, dedicated more than two years of my life and on which my personal and professional future depends.

Wanna help?

  1. Share the campaing on social networks
  2. Post this link in Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+: http://bit.ly/qilotoa
  3. You can invite people to visit our landing page of the project: http://bit.ly/investinqilotoa  

Featured in

http://www.behindthespin.com/news/crowdfunding-opens-for-communication-monitoring-solution 

Versión en Español


Introducción

¡Ayuda a crear la primera solución integral de seguimiento y análisis de medios, publicidad y redes sociales en Latinoamérica!

Después de 2 años de investigación, Qilotoa se presenta como la oferta definitiva para cubrir todas las necesidades que tienen responsables de marketing, y directores de comunicación y relaciones públicas para conocer lo que el público lee, escucha, ve y opina. 

¿Por qué Qilotoa? 

Porque soluciona un problema que compartimos con miles de profesionales de publicidad, relaciones públicas y la comunicación en todo el mundo: enterarse de lo que se dice y se proyecta de una marca, un producto o de la reputación de alguien en todos los medios y en tiempo real, a través de una única plataforma que podrá ser consultada vía web, tablets y móviles.

Nuestro propósito es que miles de personas sean más eficaces con su tiempo y más exitosos en su trabajo, para que puedan entender con claridad lo que el público lee, escucha, ve y opina, y así tomar las mejores decisiones para conseguir sus objetivos.  

¿Qué hace exactamente Qilotoa?

Qilotoa permitirá conocer con exactitud, y prácticamente en tiempo real, el impacto de la inversión en publicidad y comunicación, y el alcance en audiencia, de todo tipo de medios de una manera fácil y moderna.

Qilotoa ofrece en una solución única el acceso directo a todas las menciones editoriales e inserciones publicitarias en TV, radio, prensa escrita y online, sin límites.  

Qilotoa enriquece esta información con datos geolocalizados sobre el impacto en redes sociales, convirtiéndola en la herramienta más completa y avanzada del mercado. 

Qilotoa ofrece una función única al ofrecer “pre-trending topics” específicos cuando detecta una actividad inusualmente alta de un tema específico.

Qilotoa brinda a los clientes, gracias a la avanzada tecnología “Speech to Text”,  la posibilidad de acceder prácticamente en tiempo real a las menciones en TV y radio, e incluso les permite editarlas y distribuirlas al instante y sin intermediarios, las 24 horas, los 7 días de la semana.  

Qilotoa realiza el seguimiento de la aparición de una marca en Televisión a través de un moderno sistema de reconocimiento de imágenes en movimiento.

Qilotoa realiza análisis de todas las menciones editoriales, inserciones publicitarias y redes sociales en una solución integral, que reduce costes, trabajo y errores al tener todo centralizado en una única solución.

Qilotoa ofrece servicios “todo incluido” para evitar sorpresas cuando hay un gran volumen de menciones en distintos tipos de medios.

Contribuciones

  • Hasta el 90% de los fondos recaudados se destinarán a la implementación de la solución
  • Al tratarse de una solución empresarial, estamos ofreciendo recompensas relacionadas con los medios de comunicación y con Ecuador. ¡Resultará divertido apoyarnos!  Obtendrás más que un producto. ¡Quizás incluso tendrás la oportunidad de disfrutar la experiencia de tu vida!
  • En caso de no alcanzar el objetivo propuesto en esta campaña, seguiremos buscando fondos para la implementación del proyecto. ¡Qilotoa será una realidad!
Qilotoa es un proyecto de la agencia túatú social media & pr, que ofrecerá el producto inicialmente en Ecuador, pero que es escalable para ofrecerlo a otros países de Latinoamérica rápidamente.

Superando dificultades

Soy Octavio Rojas, y hoy te pido que me ayudes a sacar adelante mi proyecto, hoy te pido que me ayudes a cumplir mi sueño.

Y mi sueño es Qilotoa.

Hace casi 8 años, le expuse la visión original de mi proyecto a una persona que respeto mucho, y él me dijo: “Eso es algo que no sabes hacer.  Dedícate a lo que sabes hacer bien”.   Le hice caso y me fue bien.  

Le estoy agradecido a esta persona, pero, hace más de 2 años, la vida me llevó a retomar mi visión original.  Comencé a madurarla y a investigar.  Formé un equipo, conseguí partners, hablé con gente de muchas partes del mundo, desde América hasta Asia, pasando por Europa y Centroamérica.  Compartí mi coche y mi casa a través de Blablacar y de Airbnb para ahorrar y financiar mis viajes de investigación. 

Ha sido un largo camino en el que muchas personas me han apoyado, pero también ha habido  quien me ha dicho que a lo mejor debo aceptar que no voy a conseguirlo. 

Por fin un día me di cuenta de que mi visión es posible y que incluso podía ir más lejos.  Fue una emoción muy grande. 

Aún tengo ilusión y este esfuerzo de dirigirme a ti nace de la ganas de hacer realidad una visión, un proyecto profesional, un sueño por el que he hipotecado mi casa, invertido mis ahorros, dedicado más 2 años de mi vida y en el que está en juego mi futuro personal y profesional. 

Muchísimas gracias por tu apoyo.

¿Quieres ayudar?

  1. Comparte esta campaña en redes sociales.
  2. Publica este link en Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+: http://bit.ly/qilotoa
  3. Puedes invitar a la gente a que visite la página específica del proyecto: http://bit.ly/investinqilotoa
story_txt:
Introduction 

Introducing Qilotoa, the definitive solution for monitoring and analyzing
advertising, media and social networks in Latin America, via the integration of
the most advanced technologies available on the market.



After two years of research, Qilotoa was born as the definitive solution to meet all the needs of marketing, communication and public relations professionals by allowing them to find out what people are reading, listening to, watching and talking about.



Why
Qilotoa?

 Because it’s the solution to a problem we shared with thousands of
professionals in the fields of advertising, public relations and communication
around the world: how to find out what’s being said and broadcast about a
brand, product or reputation across all media and in real time. Qilotoa offers
a way to do this using a single platform that can be accessed via website,
tablet and smartphone.




What does Qilotoa do exactly?
Qilotoa will
allow them to know exactly what impact an investment in advertising and
communication achieves and its audience reach across all types of media. What’s
more, it will do so in a way that’s easy, modern and practically in real time.
Qilotoa offers
a single solution providing direct, limitless access to all of the editorial
mentions and advertising placements on TV, radio, in the press and online.  
Public
relations and advertising, united for the first time in a single tool!
Qilotoa enriches
this information with geolocated data regarding the impact on social networks.
This makes it the most complete and advanced tool on the market. 




Qilotoa also
offers the unique function of specific “pre-trending topics” when it detects
unusually high activity related to a specific subject.



Thanks to
the use of advanced “Speech to Text” technology, Qilotoa offers users the
opportunity to access mentions on TV and radio and even edit and distribute
them instantly, without intermediaries and practically in real time, 24/7. 



Qilotoa
monitors how many times a brand appears on TV by using a modern
recognition system for moving images.
Qilotoa analyses
all of the editorial mentions, advertising placements and social network
references, providing an integrated solution that will lower costs, lighten
workloads and reduce errors by centralizing all the information within a single
solution.
Qilotoa
offers “all-inclusive” services to prevent surprises when there is a large
volume of mentions in different types of media.

Qilotoa is a project developed by túatú social media & pr agency. It will be
offered in Ecuador initially, but its scalable nature means it can quickly be
offered to other countries in Latin America.

The methodology behind Qilotoa is the
brainchild of Octavio Isaac Rojas Orduña, the founder of túatú Spain and túatú
Ecuador and a public relations expert whose multicultural perspective has
benefited over 200 clients in five different countries over the course of his
20-plus years in the industry. 
 
Contributions

Up to 90% of 
the funds collected will go directly to the deployment of the solution.
Since it is a B2B solution, we are offering perks related to the media and Ecuador.  It will be fun to support us!  You can get more than just an object, but maybe a lifetime experience.
In case we don't reach the goal here, we will keep looking for the funds.  

We are doing Qilotoa, period!

With the funds, túatú social media & pr agency, which has offices in both Spain and Ecuador, will accelerate the deployment of Qilotoa in Ecuador and subsequently bring it to other markets in Latin America.PerksOvercoming challenges

   

My name is Octavio Rojas, leader of Qilotoa's project, and today I’m asking you to help me move my project forward and help make my dream come true.
That dream is Qilotoa.
Nearly
eight years ago, I explained the original vision for my project to someone who
I respect a great deal, and he told me: “This is something you don’t know how
to do. Dedicate yourself to what you do best”. I took his advice, and it proved
to be sound.  
I’m
grateful to this person, but more than two years ago, my journey through life
caused me to return to my original vision. I started to refine the idea and carry
out research. I built a team, found partners and spoke to people from all over
the world, from the Americas to Asia via Europe and Central America. I shared
my car and my house on Blablacar and Airbnb in order to finance
my research trips.  
It’s been a
long journey, and many people have supported me along the way, although there
have also been those who’ve told me I should accept that I’ll never make this
dream come true.  
But
finally, one day I realized that my vision was not only possible, but could
even go further. It was a fantastic feeling. 
To make my
project a reality, to make my dream come true, I’ll need help.  
I’m so
excited about this project, and I’m contacting you because I want to make my
professional vision a reality, to make my dream come true; a dream for which I’ve
mortgaged my house, invested my savings, dedicated more than two years of my
life and on which my personal and professional future depends.
Wanna help?


Share the campaing on social networks
Post this link in Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google+: http://bit.ly/qilotoa

You can invite people to visit our landing page of the project: http://bit.ly/investinqilotoa  



Featured in


http://www.behindthespin.com/news/crowdfunding-opens-for-communication-monitoring-solution

story:
Our story. What we do.

When two earthquakes struck Nepal with violent force a small team of accomplished young adults came together with a clear vision; to rebuild villages and regrow communities in a wholesome, innovative and (self-)sustainable way.

Through the well-established NGO Volunteer For Change (VFC) in partnership with Rotary Club of Jawlakhel Manjushre (RCJM) we launched the Rebuild For Change initiative - initially focusing our entire efforts into immediate relief; temporary shelters, temporary birthing clinics, food and water distribution and setting up schools. It was, and still is, a dire situation that affects countless families who have lost both loved ones, homes and livelihood. 

However, we are now fully engaged in organizing permanent, eco-sustainable and earthquake-proof solutions - and we will start by regrowing Manegaun village through Earthbag-construction and "natural building principles".


Why Earthbag? 

Simple! After our first assessment we realized that the 50 Earthbag-constructions already built around Nepal, all survived the catastrophic earthquake with minimum damage. 

Here is an example of an Earthbag-home in the making: 

Earthbag construction is not just earthquake-proof, but has the tremendous advantage of providing either thermal mass or insulation - depending on content. When filled with soil they provide thermal mass, but when filled with lighter weight materials, such as crushed stone, or rice hulls, they provide insulation. The bags can even act as natural non-wicking, somewhat insulated foundations when they are filled with gravel.


Why Manegaun? 

As we were distributing initial relief materials we stumbled upon a local community who was severely devastated by the two earthquakes in April and May 2015 - the village of Manegaun.

We have chosen to rebuild Manegaun based on three accounts; first and foremost the community here belongs to the Tamang people - an often exposed and marginalized ethnic-group. Secondly, their willingness for active participation and openness towards innovative approaches. Thirdly, its proximity to Kathmandu will make it easier to transport materials and keep our presence vivid and alive.

According to our recent census data, Manegaun encompasses 67 (now completely ruined) households, and counts a total population of 395, among which 170 are male, 154 are female and 71 are children. 

Rebuild for Change  has been working here for three months, setting up 55 transitional shelters with toilet facilities, solar panels, mobile chargers and lights - we have also conducted two health camps with the help of various partners like BVS Nepal, NERA, RCJM, Alka Hospital and Tilganga Institute of Ophthalmology.
.



What we need from you. 

We are currently collaborating with different partners and private donors that are helping us realize our project. However, first priority is to rebuild the houses of Manegaun.

To ensure proper permanent housing for the whole village, we will need to raise USD 341,700. However, what we ask of you is...

... help to build the first 10 houses!

Together with a team of experts, VFC has designed earthquake-proof structures using natural and recycled indigenous materials as described above. Each house built on earthbag principles will have a cost of 5,100 USD.

As additional funds become available we will incorporate other innovative utilities in accordance with Natural Building Principles:

  • renewable energy.
  • rainwater harvesting.
  • sewage treatment. 
  • tempered indoor climate

What about the rest of the project?

Through exstensive surveys and site-assessement we have identified 6 vital components to actualize our vision for regrowing self-reliant and harmonious communities:

  • Permanent housing: rebuilding the village in an innovative, earthquake-proof manner via Natural Building Principles. 
  • Education: set up an Early Childhood Development (ECD) centre, provide adult literacy classes, computer classes, provide trainings to the teachers  of the local school and enhance the structural facilities.
  • Socio-economic development: providing soft loans, innovative technologies and trainings in agriculture, livestock, small businesses, and launching a homestay tourism programme.
  • Health/sanitation and water: securing proper health and sanitation with access to clean water.
  • Energy: introducing solar-power and biogas (solar street lights, improved cooking stoves)
  • Community-based facilities: build different common facilities (pandheros, park, multi-functional hall) to create a sense of community-engagement.

Here is a sneak-peak of our masterplan - showing you how we envision Burunchuli! 




How will my contribution be applied?


The funds raised in the campaign will be used in two ways:

  1.  Buy appropriate materials.
  2.  Employ local workers to start construction. 

Every single donation, no matter the size, makes an actual impact and will help rejuvenate Nepal and invigorate her children - one home, one family and one smile at a time.

Making a donation might be easy and fast - but it truly is a meaningful gesture towards a country that has touched the hearts of so many - and where the struggle of loosing both home and livelihood has become a reality for millions. 

If chance happens that we exceed our financial goal we will immediately start actualizing our 6 other components. 

Our project takes a holistic approach to rehabilitation and every day we seek to strengthen:

  • Education and innovation.

  • Community empowerment - with emphasis on women's empowerment.

  • Eco-sustainability.

Can I come visit?

Yes, indeed! In exchange for your generosity we are providing unique perks according to donation: volunteer and tourist opportunities along with home stays at Manegaun itself - meeting and befriending the families whose homes you helped build! 

These adventures will provide you with a sense of what we're doing - and you will be more than welcome to join the VFC and RCJM team for a longer or shorter period of time.
If you're already dreaming about (re)visiting this ancient Himalayan abode, why not take an opportunity to go beyond where most tourists go? To become an authentic part of a Nepali family? 

What can I do to help?

Please help us by donating and sharing this campaign.

We want the Rebuild For Change initiative to reach as many people as possible. You can share and connect with your friends and family - invite them to learn more about what we do, and should their hearts beat in tune with ours; donations are received with humble gratitude. 

(Also, you can remind your friends about our DONATION PERKS! ) 

If time is what you have to share we're always looking for like-minded individuals to come help us realize our projects. Feel absolutely free to reach out to us and hear how you can lend a hand.

Thank you for your patience and remember: whatever contribution, however small, will be put to efficient use. This is our promise to you.

Also, please help us spread awareness about our projects by liking and sharing our facebook page, and follow us on Twitter.

For further information about us, please feel free to have a look at our website, and don't forget to check out our RFC project page, where you can also download all our project documents!
In order to ensure full transparency we will also be disclosing all our project reports and financial data in this section.

If you have any further questions /suggestions, please contact our CEO Aanand Mishra at: aanand@vfcnepal.org. 

Much love,

Team VFC

story:
Use Them or Lose Them:  Keep your 2nd Amendment Rights

Are you prepared to protect your loved ones?  If not we are the people you need to visit.  Devildawg Firearms is not only ready to sell you a firearm but will teach you and your family how to use it correctly and safely. 

My name is Matthew Barges and I am ready to serve you just like I served my country.  I am a Marine, a husband, and father that is ready to help you and your family protect themselves and embrace the sport of shooting.  It would be an honor and a privilege to help you with your firearm needs.  
Top reasons why YOU want to support Devildawg Firearms:
1.  Devildawg firearms will NOT treat you like the "big box" retail stores.  We are there to educate and make you feel comfortable with your purchase. 
2.  Devildawg firearms follows all the ATF guidelines on all purchases and sales.  
3.  Our range is a FULL service range.  We are ready to assist you with any of your shooting needs and comply with EPA and OSHA guidelines for our ventilation system.  The range will be a NRA certified range as well.
4.  Most of all, Devildawg firearms values all of their customers and their firearm needs as if they were family.
5.  Lifetime Perks are a HUGE reason to support Devildawg Firearms.  Once you support us we will consider you one of the family with the perks we are ready to offer you!


Let's get to it:  What We Need & What You Get

What We NEED:
Unfortunately, the banks and the government still have FFL(Federal Firearm Retailers) under "operation choke point".  What this means is we have great difficulty receiving traditional funding for our small business and this is why we are reaching out to you.  Banks will not give an SBA(small business) loan to any business that has to deal with firearms.  NOT good for us!  My family consists of myself as a heavy equipment mechanic and my wife is an elementary school teacher.  So NO millions of dollars in the Barges' bank account ready to fund this important venture.  Time to get off my soap box!
Our TWO needs are simple:
1.  We need funding to finish building (in our own building) our 8 lane at 20 yard range in Villa Park, Illinois.  This range will be able to handle rifle, pistol, and tactical shooting.
2.  We need funding for firearm inventory to satisfy a variety of needs for all customers.
What You GET, the PERKS:
First off, no amount is too small.  We at Devildawg firearms appreciate any amount given and cannot thank you enough!
$10  Friend of the 2nd Amendment
This is a donation for one hour of free range time at Devildawg Firearms.
$50 Wear Our Name Proudly


This donation amount will get you an embroidered Devildawg Firearm baseball cap and one hour of range time. (embroidered hats are ONLY offered to members and contributors)
$100 Fashion Statement


This donation amount will get you an embroidered Devildawg Firearm jacket and one hour of range time.  
$250  Keep My Scores a Secret -Shhhhhhhhhh
This donation amount includes:
  • free use of lane during business hours for ONE year(two hours max on non-busy days)
  • guest shooter gets to shoot for $5 and $10 for an extra lane
  • phone-in and email reservations
  • 5% off all range merchandise (excluding ammunition)
  • 5% off all firearms and accessories
  • includes free inspection from gunsmith and free cleaning supplies to clean your firearm
$350 Plays Well With Others
This donation amount includes:
  • free use of lane during business hours for ONE year(two hours max during off-peak hours)
  • guest shooter gets to shoot for free and $5 for an extra lane (during off-hours)
  • phone-in and email reservations
  • 10% off all range merchandise (excluding ammunition)
  • 10% off all firearms and accessories
  • includes free inspection from gunsmith and free cleaning supplies to clean your firearm
  • one free gun rental for use in the Devildawg Firearm range
  • free embroidered Devildawg Firearm baseball cap
$500 Business and BIG Family
This donation amount includes:
  • free use of lane during business hours for ONE year(two hours max during off peak hours)
  • 2 guest shooters for free 
  • phone-in and email reservations
  • 15% off all range merchandise (excluding ammunition)
  • 15% off all firearms and accessories
  • includes free inspection from gunsmith and free cleaning supplies to clean your firearm
  • multiple free gun rental for use in the Devildawg Firearm range
  • private party discounts on or before or after range time
  • free embroidered Devildawg Firearm jacket
$5000  Lifers
This donation amount includes:
  • free use of lane during business hours for life (non-transferable-two hours max on non-busy days)
  • 3 free guest shooters
  • phone-in and email reservations
  • 20% off all range merchandise (excluding ammunition)
  • 20% off all firearms and accessories
  • includes free inspection from gunsmith and free cleaning
  • multiple free gun rental for use in the Devildawg Firearm range
  • private party discounts on or before or after range time
  • free embroidered Devildawg jacket and hat 
  • membership club only, access to members only lounge(free training from on duty staff, free beverages and snacks)
  • 100 rounds of free range ammunition for each month(does not carry over, use it or lose it)
$10,000 Piece of the Pie
  • 5% ownership of Devildawg Firearms
  • free use of lane during business hours for life (non-transferable-two hours max on non-busy days)
  • 3 free guest shooters
  • phone-in and email reservations
  • 25% off all range merchandise and firearm accessories (excluding ammunition)
  • dealers cost plus tax on firearms
  • includes free inspection from gunsmith and free cleaning
  • multiple free gun rental for use in the Devildawg Firearm range
  • private party discounts on or before or after range time
  • free embroidered Devildawg jacket and hat 
  • membership club only, access to members only lounge(free training from on duty staff, free beverages and snacks)
  • 100 rounds of free range ammunition for each month(does not carry over, use it or lose it)
Finally, no one is locked into any one amount.  You can donate $1 or all $300,000. You don't have to get a perk, but we feel that it is an excellent way to protect your 2nd Amendment right and you can get a great deal in the process.
What if we don't reach our goal:
Simple, we will continue to build our range and supply our store with the funds that are donated.  

The Actual Devildawg Firearms Facility:
Our shop is located in Villa Park, Illinois.  Here are a few pictures that show the store front, classroom, and future range.   The facility has enough concrete to take a nuclear blast.  So we are very fortunate that we found a building that is perfect for firearm enthusiasts.


Store Front:
Our firearm shop will carry the latest and greatest pistols, rifles, shotguns, tools, accessories, supplies, and ammunition for all of our customers.   We will have firearms available to purchase displayed for you along with our range rentals.

 
Classroom:
Our classroom holds up to 30 students.  We plan to have weekly classes that range from beginner level up to instructor level courses.  We pride ourselves in making sure you are fully educated before owning your firearm or using it in our range.

 
The Range:


Shooting Lanes-Our plan is to have 8 shooting lanes.  Each lane will have individual stalls, separating you from other shooters.  Each lane will also have a shooter's table to load your firearms/magazines.  
Target Systems:  Our target systems are systems that will not consist of any down time.  There will be no cables or holders to shoot off while you are firing. The electronic controls are easy to use and will provide distances

.
Ventilation System:  Our goal is to have air that is cleaner than a hospital.  To be able to have clean air inside the range we need a powerful ventilation system that will ventilate the lead and other air-borne toxins.  This is the the most costly component of the range.  Our customers' health will not be compromised.  
Why should you help us?

Whether you like firearms or not this is important to all American citizens and here is why:

1.  It is our constitutional right.  Law-abiding citizens should be able to protect themselves.

2.  Safe gun ownership is a pillar of the American way of life that we will protect and promote. 

3.  Devildawg firearms will provide a positive, safe, and low pressure environment for ALL shooters.  We do not want to just arm you with a firearm, we are passionate about giving you the training you need to be a confident firearm owner.  

YOU CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!

In conclusion, we appreciate the time you took to read our proposal.  Now we need your help, here are a variety of options if you would like to help:

1.  Pick a Perk and get a piece of the action!

2.  Send this page to people you know will be interested.

3.  Like us on Facebook (DevilDawg Firearms)

4.  Do not hesitate to email or contact us with any questions you may still have, we are happy to talk further about our venture with anyone.

You have a chance to support responsible gun ownership and that is what truly matters!  Knowledge is power and Clint Eastwood said it best, "I have a very strict gun control policy:  if there's a gun around, I want to be in control of it."

Semper Fi,

Matthew Barges

President of DevilDawg Firearms

DevilDawgfirearms@comcast.net

(630)359-5306
