story:
Rebates2Riches (R2R) is a secured savings membership club, where members can purchase from their favorite retailers or wholesalers, and receive rebates in physical gold. We have a "1st to Market Advantage" with Gold-back rebates, and secured it with a "Patent-Pending" awarded status, to eliminate direct competition .


Free gold?! What’s the catch, you ask? There is none!

Products don’t cost you anything more; simply spend what you normally would and watch your tax-free gold pile up.

We are the Uber, Airbnb, or Netflix of the rebates and rewards industry and, in some significant ways, possibly all of e-commerce: a true “Business Disruptor” that will change how business is done in the rebates and rewards sector for years to come. As well as a possible shake-up of all of e-commerce,as we "see" (match) their discount pricing ,and "raise" them by a Free Gold-back reward! So,why go anywhere else ? No "Liars Poker "Bluff, just the indisputable winning-hand!



Current loyalty programs focus on cash-back, points, airline miles, and other corporate currencies that are not universally accepted and carry unsustainable value over time.

Paper money (fiat money) as an item isn’t actually valuable; it’s constantly fluctuating value is only derived from supply and demand. Because fiat money isn’t backed by any item of physical worth (like gold), its value is completely made-up in conception, and it’s printed out of thin air.

Rebates2Riches, meanwhile, uses pure physical gold rewards that have a 6,000+ year legacy of carrying actual value as currency. Our patent-pending formula was created and designed to answer a simple question we all share:



Rebates in gold have never been done before. Gold never loses value, as all paper or digital fiat currency does, and it’s accepted globally, unlike cash-back country-specific currencies and other forms of loyalty rewards, such as: points, air miles, corporate-branded currencies, etc.

Rebates from shopping purchases are also deemed non-taxable by the IRS, so you keep all of it! It’s simple: shop Amazon or Overstock or any of our other affiliated retailers, pay exactly the same price as you normally would, but receive (free) gold-back -- it’s a no-brainer!


The path to financial freedom looks like this:


The path to financial freedom mandates that you live a comfortable life filled with all the same shopping that you would normally do. Log into R2R, click on our link to your favorite online retailer (Amazon, Target, Etsy, eBay, Expedia, etc.), buy whatever you want, and just because we brought them business, that company will give us a percentage of your purchases (i.e. commissions that range between 2-30%). We return that money 100% to you in the form of pure physical Gold.


We even allow customers to see how much commission/rebate they are getting prior to purchasing their product. That means that if both Target and Walmart carry the same goose down comforter for the same price, you can choose to purchase it from whichever one will give you the greater rebate.

While you’re shopping and comparing commissions, your options are essentially limitless. Through Rebates2Riches, customers will eventually be able to buy, lease, or rent anything and everything from everyday products to new gadgets, travel arrangements, funeral and wedding arrangements, medical tourism procedures, and even all types of insurance...and get Gold-Back rebates on every purchase.

Banks are unreliable. We saw it with Cyprus and we’re seeing it right now with Greece – when an economy tanks, banks close and ATMs and online banking cease to function because they can’t pay back all the cash they’re supposedly holding for depositors. R2R holds all customer Gold secured in its entirety (Full Reserve, not fractional), in the biggest and best-proven private vaults, completely separate from banks. These companies specialize in holding billions in precious metals and hold insurance policies through Global insurers like Lloyds of London, and constant auditing by the Big 5 Global accounting firms. Or you can take physical possession of it .

With R2R, you can actually save up to 100% of all the money you’ve ever spent over time in the long run. See our "Do The Math" video for clarity and certainty on this:        https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c5DFEZjGHek

Our rebates form a passive secure savings that is non-taxable. You can even still use your normal rewards credit card to make purchases with our associated retailers and collect double rewards: points/miles/cash-back from your credit card and Gold from R2R -- simultaneously!

While your gold continues to pile up while you do nothing at all, you’re free to sell any or all of it back to R2R whenever you want. Our accounting software will give you 24/7 access to your accounting of funds, so you always know how much gold you have as well as its current fiat money exchange equivalent.

While gold is our staple, we also will allow customers to exchange their rebates for silver, as well as numerous and growing traditional fiat currencies and Bitcoins. Plus, our own Gold/Silver backed Crypto-Currency OMG (OMG= Oh My Gold- TM) Coin (i.e Coming soon...as we have pre-negotiated a proven white-label platform) !

The best part of R2R is how simple it is! You don’t even have to think about growing your savings because it’s happening automatically. Everyday shopping turns into extra "free" & REAL money you would have never seen before a program like Rebates 2 Riches.

Most Americans (over 60%) have less than $1000 in savings, and the so-called millennials generation has a negative 2% savings rate  (i.e. Google it !). The rest of much or most of the developed world , now has effectively or directive-ly, gone to Negative Interest rates (i.e. charging for “safe” savings) in Banks and Bonds, so even the traditional savers, like the Japanese and Chinese etc, have started to spend and spend and spend. So, R2R is a Natural and logical : Save-Yours (saviors) Solution ! The short-term ups and downs of gold prices in terms of current fiat currencies valuations, do not matter as much, as you will be laying up secured piles of (FREE) Golden Treasures in measures, that never go to Zero!

Why? Gold has a "Pension Envy" level CAGR (Compounded Annual Growth Rate) of over 8% over the last 44 years since we went off the Gold for Fiat USD-US Treasury Exchange option.

**Future Returns Disclaimer: Politicians will not stop promising and printing , to buy votes and pay for endless Warfare and Welfare! So History will surely  be repetitive in this for the foresee-able future! The ONLY true escape from this defined insanity course, is a return to Real Money= Gold...which will send the price of Gold in USD and this CAGR up to the stratosphere! End of Story!


We’ve made some great progress with R2Rso far: we have been awarded patent-pending status by the USPTO for our first-of-its-kind rebate to gold conversion program, and so much more...you can see, and hear much or most of it all in our documents and Media intro-info (linked below) :


*** Non-Provisional Utility Patent-Pending status

( filing No. 14/922,578 )


1)  Landing Page =  http://rebates2riches.launchrock.com/


2) KSU(KillerStartUps) Review =http://killerstartups.com/startup-reviews/rebates2riches


3) Pitch Deck =** Links and files Only available to "Accredited Investors" (SEC definition) if you are a resident of the USA, or "Qualified Investors" residents of all other countries. Minimum $25,000 USD ( Equity/Convertible Debt) to participate.   If you meet those requirements ,contact us directly, to be granted access.


4) Profile & Business Plan (i.e.via 2 click Tabs at top) = **same as above...if you qualify,send us a specific request stating that ,to be granted access to the links and Docs.


5) Branding Videos Playlist =

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mHmPGfKlU9g&list=PLvjXRgFIiv5kDVXEj4y_38KV3vNkFZOg9&index=1


It also has strong elements of : Social Good , Sustainability and Security benefits for our Membership Society.If you fail to see these elements ,you owe it to yourself ,and your constituency, to let me clarify whatever aspects you’re missing in order  to conclude that. If you see it,you need to determine how you would want to be a partner participant .and/or member, in it !


“You never change things by fighting the existing reality.To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.”―R. Buckminster Fuller .This is exactly what we have done for the very 1st time ever, in the global marketplaces with R2R !




            

 Yes...that is a real live Tiger I have by the Tail...or Tale...in Thailand !

This series of photos is from a trip I made to Istanbul, Turkey, a major global Gold refining capital. This is a refinery that makes small ingots of Gold Bullion, we call "Practical Gold Units" (i.e .1 /2.5 /5 /10 gram)since they are portable and trade-able (sale-able/spend-able). Inserted in a Credit Card size plastic encasement, they fit in your wallet !
 




End of the Istanbul, Turkey refinery series. Some aspects & areas could not be photographed or shown due to security concerns...as the buildings are full of Gold & Silver!

That is I, with some Executives at the new Shanghai (China) Gold Exchange.

Shanghai Gold Exchange (SGX), which is the world’s biggest physical trading platform for the metal.The SGX has LBMA/COMEX certified 4 & 5 nines fine Gold refineries in its supply lines.

Here I am with President Correa of Ecuador (and some of his Security team), great GOLD resources in South America.

Note: All of our Gold is 24 K  999.9 (four nines fine) 5 (999.99) in China through the SGX , all from LBMA & COMEX etc certified refineries. All held in the top trusted insured and audited Private Vaults (Non-Bank), holding Billions in Bullion! It may be sourced from around the world mining operations, but assayed and refined and held (insured & audited) at the highest standards anywhere!

** Specific info on resources and partner or associated firms will be available to substantial contributors and investors ,and will be avail on our website for members & Affiliate Marketers, at full Launch. The more involved (vested) they are, the more informed they will be.


Rebates2Riches has been created and run solely by Steven Michael Kelley up to this point. As a one-man-band, he has led the parade on all aspects: strategizing, sourcing, set-up,start-up, and pre-selling the concepts, on the path to financial freedom through secure gold savings rebates on all imaginable spending events.

He cut his teeth first in sales and sales management, then as an international business consultant and trouble-shooter in the areas of: offshore structuring & transactions, offshore banking, and international referral marketing organizations, among others. He is an expert in strategizing, sourcing, set-up, start-up, and selling for private and publicly traded companies, as well as having extensive experiential knowledge in many aspects of: gold, currencies, cultures, commodities, and the true nature of money and value. He is known professionally and personally as "The DUI (Difficult, Unusual, Impossible) Guy" for finding savvy solutions to problems when no one else can.

Steven has been able to handle a lot of aspects of building Rebates2Riches himself, but establishing a competent executive team is an essential step to move fast & furiously forward. Proper levels of funding will facilitate that and much more.


What We Need & What You Get

As the funds roll in, we will ramp-up and wrap-up most of the key foundational elements we have already taken to an almost ready for prime-time status (i.e. see our attached and available links for the rest of the already accomplished lists story). We are also raising funds through our simultaneous Equity Crowdfunding campaign efforts ,and through direct Contacts and their referrals. All funds will seamlessly flow together ,and allow us to offer fully functional Memberships with numerous major retailers,offering millions of products at their best public discounts with our free Gold rebates on top right out-of-the-gate,with just the amounts being requested here: $100,000 USD plus the Merchant processing and Indegogo  fees (approx. 10% on top) charged here, making up the rest of this requested goal.

Any funds which are raised above that amount will allow us to accomplish planned later stage development phases early. Including some pre-negotiated proprietary products ,that will of course sell at the best going market rates, and give free Gold- back Rebates on top, plus pay-out our pre-programmed  Referral Affiliate Marketing Program Commissions.

Check out our Perks Section Page for what you get for helping to bring this worthwhile project, which obviously has strong elements of : Social Good , Sustainability and Security benefits for our Membership Society, to fruition.


Risks & Challenges

All of the elements needed for R2R to become a reality already exist and are proven for our exact uses. We have just put them together in a new savvy synergy solution. The Founder and CFFO has done this all, in every element, before for his consulting contracting clients, so he will perform even more passionately and powerfully for this his own sole dream creation. Obstacles to him are: Opportunities to Overcome, to always Outperform ! Success comes from doing what others won't to attain it !

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can't contribute financially, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Join in our referral rewards program, for bringing others who can help fund us!

story:
Vieques Island's First Distillery

Crab Island Rum is the first rum legally distilled and bottled in the island of Vieques, Puerto Rico.

2016 is the Year of the Crab and you can be part of it!

Claim your Rum Bottle Vouchers beginning early 2017. Thank you for your support!

Pre-Order Crab Island Rum Right Now!

 

Vieques is a small but pretty awesome island southwest of Puerto Rico. It's about three times the size of Manhattan with a rural community of roughly 9,000 people. Surrounded by the best beaches of this Caribbean archipelago and home to one of the brightest bioluminescent bays on the planet.  This is the place I grew up and the island I love.


My name is Ivan Torres Ortiz, and I will be your main rum provider!

Growing up in Vieques is a blessing that words cannot explain. For many locals this island does not offer the kind of job they would like to have after finishing a college education.  For me, Vieques is rich in opportunities and I believe I found mine.

After graduating from college I decided to return to my island. My goal and my desire is to find success here and help others to see all the opportunities that can be cultivated here. Striving for that goal is how I started Crab Island Rum.




It all began from the Viequense tradition of home made rum for the holidays. During that time of the year you can easily find liquor bottles without a label but always with a story behind them. The rest of the year this elixir is absent from everywhere else.  It stays hiding in the woods until next Christmas.

I decided to go inside the forest to find where this rum was hiding and how it was made. I went through all of the experiences from old folks stories and theories of how to do it right to improvised laboratories and books with scientific terminologies that makes you feel like you actually need something to drink.

Through all of that work and searching, I found Crab Island Rum! "Crab Island" comes from the name cartographers gave Vieques during the colonization time. When they first visited her shores they found so many crabs that it made their job super easy, and Vieques named herself Crab Island for a while.




Pretty soon our distillery will break the rules of industrialization in the Capital of Rum to become the first artisan-handcrafted spirit in Puerto Rico.

Crab Island is happening and our goal is to be distilling before the end of 2016!


 

Everything started with and idea and the passion of making it happening.  But that is not the beauty of this project.  The most unpredictable and awesome feeling is to be able to spread the same passion to other people that believe in the project and want to be a part of it. It is because of friends and family why we have experienced so much progress in the last year.
6-27-16 Our new still has arrived!


We have a signed lease for an old and abandoned fire station.  This station is one of the remaining structures from the US Navy after they left Vieques in 2003.  The building has the necessary space for the equipment and by today is almost ready to receive them all.

  • Building has been stripped, scrubbed, primed and painted.
  • Roof has been patched and sealed.
  • Building totally rewired and plumbed.
  • Electric fixtures refurbished and reinstalled.
  • Bathrooms have been built and tiled.
  • New security windows and doors purchased and installed.
  • Rolling doors (three) purchased and installed.
  • Exterior boiler room constructed.


A new 300g still made out of stainless, copper and glass is on the way!  The expected delivery time is in May 20, 2016.  Besides the still we have:

  • 5 stainless steel tanks for rum fermentation
  • 4 Stainless steel hoses
  • 2 centrifugal pumps
  • 2 paddle agitators
  • 1 New 15 hp Fulton propane boiler
  • 1 Gravity bottle filler machine
  • 1 chiller
  • 1 activated carbon filter system
  • Lots others miscellaneous that will help to crank this thing up!



The lack of infrastructure of water and electricity on Vieques island is a well-known problem. The building itself provides awesome structure but there is no easy access to water and electricity.  The closest connection for the electric is six poles away. And for the water is about 750 feet away. So far we have carried the water by truck and provide electricity using a small generator.

To make this distillery happen we need to have the electricity. In the last couple of months we reviewed many alternatives for energy and connecting to public electric company line is the most affordable. Our ultimate goal is to be as energy efficient as we can and switch to renewable energy sources. The lack of infrastructure is a big expense that was not part of our distillery budget but now  there is crowdfunding!

Crowdfunding offers a great opportunity to help cover for this expenses. But most important to share with lots more people what will be something really cool in this island. A new attraction, a new industry, a new economy! But, most importantly, craft rum that embodies the history and culture of my island.

CONTRIBUTOR PERKS



The A Team

Linda, Burr, Ismael, Luis, Paola, Pay, Karl, Sara, Miguel, Valerie, Mike, Guillermo, TioVitin, Vicente, Maira, Frankie, Edgar, Rilli, Orlando, and so many others that are making this possible. Muchas gracias a todos!  


Q & A


When do I get my rum?
You will receive a voucher by email no later than August 1, 2016. Vouchers can be claimed beginning December, 2016. You must be 21 years of age to redeem a rum bottle voucher.
Why is your goal $35,000 when the official estimate is about $25,000?
We factored in IndieGogo platform and transaction fees, cost of the perks and added a small percentage to cover installation overages.
When do I get my t-shirt?
All Perks (other than Rum) will begin distribution in early August, 2016.
How do I choose more than one perk?
You will need to initiate a new contribution for each perk. If you encounter difficulties, please email ivan@crabislandrum.com and use "NEED HELP WITH CONTRIBUTION" as the subject line.
How can I order Crab Island Rum for my bar, restaurant, or colmado?
For all bulk order inquires, please email ivan@crabislandrum.com and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.
There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve:Common Contribution Errors.
Why am I checking out through Indiegogo?
We are using the Indiegogo platform to maintain transparency with our campaign: all the stats, numbers, deadlines and dollars raised are real.
How old must I be to claim the Rum Bottle Perk?
You must be 21 years of age at the date of the contribution.
How does the Voucher work?
At the end of the campaign you will receive a Redeemable Voucher for your Crab Island Rum perks. This voucher can be redeemed at the Crab Island Rum Distillery on Vieques Island, Puerto Rico. Redemption and deliveries are subject to state, local and federal laws.
What are the shipping & handling costs?
Shipping and handling will be added at the end of the campaign unless noted otherwise. Shipping does vary by item, to keep it simple we will be charging a flat fee for the entire Continental United States. Alaska, Hawaii and International orders will be charged the actual shipping rate plus packing.
I am a Rum / Spirits Blogger and I'd like to write about Crab Island Rum, who do I talk to?
Contact Ivan@crabislandrum.com

Help us spread the word:

  1. Share #CrabIslandRum on social media! Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the campaign page, on the left.
  2. Talk about the project with your friends
  3. Reach out and ask us any questions you may have, we're happy to talk rum
 

Thank you!

story:
Being an LGBTI and HIV activist has required me to make many sacrifices.  Now I find myself in debt.  In order to continue doing this work I need to clear some of these debts.  Otherwise, I will have to to leave full-time advocacy and return to the private sector.

In this my 45th year, I am asking for your help to clear some of my debts by the end of 2016 so that I can remain an advocate.  

Thank you for your help!

story:
**Every contributor to our campaign with a minimum of a $35 contribution will be invited to our VIP Party. We can't wait to see you there!**

Devil’s Creek is very excited to be joining the Collingswood family! We look forward to meeting resident beer lovers and brewing enthusiasts alike! Our biggest dream is to have friends, old and new, come in and hang out and sample our beer. 

So, while we’re more than ready to take on the challenge (we've been planning this for a looooong time), we are in need of contributions for certain more expensive pieces of equipment. (You wouldn't believe how many things you need to buy, and boy do those things add up!) Although we've invested everything we've got, we still need contributions for pricey items. The absolute most important ones are a glass washer, a sterilizer and a second brite tank. Your contribution will make a big difference… you will get more interesting beers and you will get them FASTER!

Please read more about our Perks for our generous contributors on our Perks page. Most importantly, every contributor to our campaign with a minimum of a $35 contribution will be invited to our VIP Party. 

Devil's Creek Brewery will be opening in the quaint town of Collingswood, New Jersey, right outside historic Philadelphia. It's the perfect place to introduce our craft brews! Collingswood has been dry since 1888, but with all of the restaurants along the town's "main street," it just makes sense to bring the art of brewing to the neighborhood.

Anthony  Abate has been home brewing for over 15 years, and has always dreamed of opening his own brewery, especially after placing in the Samuel Adams home-brew competition a few years ago. That personal triumph just fueled his desire to share his beer prowess with his community. While he works full-time as an engineer, he spends most of his off-hours tweaking recipes, visiting breweries and drinking good local beer!

Being in New Jersey and visiting local farmstands has really inspired Anthony to take advantage of the diversity of the region's native fruits, vegetables and herbs, from tomatoes to cranberries to blueberries. Ultimately he hopes that these ingredients will make up some really exceptional and unique ales.

The brewery's team plans on launching in late April/early May with a seasonal lineup. You can expect to see maibocks, wheats, saisons, blondes and Anthony is working on a fruity IPA and double IPA. This 7-barrel operation will have 8 rotating taps, so choices will be abundant.

The brewery location, on the corner of Haddon Avenue and Powell Lane, is ideal. It's a great spot for people watching and beer tasting! In addition to floor-to-ceiling windows, the brewery will be fitted out with rustic touches, from reclaimed wood walls to funky Edison lighting fixtures. We think it will be warm and inviting!

Devil's Creek's goal is to be able to offer 32 oz. and 64 oz. growlers to patrons that want to enjoy our beer with a delicious meal at a neighboring eatery, or drafts to customers coming in to taste what we have to offer.

Kathy Abate, who learned the fine art of home brewing from her husband, has been in the advertising and graphic design field in South Jersey for many years. Kathy plans on keeping the place busy with many events, ranging from special beer tastings to Girls Night Outs to charity events. The brewery is especially looking forward to working with the Collingswood community to help with benefits and fundraising efforts for local worthy causes.

story:
Kyiv Smart City would like to change the capital of Ukraine!

We are Kyiv Smart City – a non-profit initiative, operating in the Ukrainian capital.

We are the main contact point between Kyiv citizens, authorities, activists and city officials. And our main task is to start global changes in the society of our city, create and foster a new culture of communication, promote urban projects creation and define transparency standards for all city life participants.

We have been working successfully for over 8 months and during that time we were able to create a smart city infrastructure comparable to several years of work in foreign cities. And we believe that soon Kyiv will become a true smart city.

We are creating the Smart City Hub to enhance and speed up this process.

We believe that this Hub will change our city. And we are developing it using our own resources and at our own expense. That’s why we have started this campaign.

What do we need?

We’ve found a great old place for the Kyiv Smart City Hub and now we are gathering money to renovate it and create minimal working infrastructure. The total renovation budget is $50 000.

We have already started restoration works with our own money and we are planning to open the Kyiv Smart City Hub in 3 months.

This place is being created by the community for the community. And will be extremely thankful for your help. It is really important for us and the future of the new Kyiv.

Join us!

And now some details

The Kyiv Smart City Hub will operate as a unique community center that will connect and educate active authority, eventually helping to develop urban city projects, including Kyiv Smart City framework.

And comprehensively consolidate and inspire leaders and change agents who, as a result, will develop Kyiv and the whole country.

What we create

Smart City it is not just a story about innovations and technology that are changing the face of the city. First of all, it is a story about people. About those who have decided to change something in the world around them.

The Hub will work for the people and the city community. For those who share “smart citizen” culture and use innovative approaches and technological solutions to improve urban infrastructure, along with the level and quality of city life.

Kyiv Smart City Hub – is the “point of power” for people, teams and projects who create and implement smart solutions for Kyiv and other cities.

There will be a center of expertise consolidation and competence, a communication hub for the promotion of smart city development in Ukraine, a Smart City School and an Incubator for open data urban services and applications, all located within the Smart City Hub. And this is only the beginning!

Where it will be located

Our project team has decided to locate the Hub on the territory of the Exhibition of Economic Achievements here in Kyiv.

It’s one of the greatest architectural complexes of the Soviet Era, which is now changing into an innovations cluster. For now this place is being actively developed by a team of young professionals and change agents.  

And we are sure, that together we can create a new symbol of innovative and creative Kyiv, which will become a "smart city".

Kyiv Smart City Hub Activities

The Hub will not only connect and grow social capital, but also will be a test and demonstration platform for the Kyiv Smart City Concept 2020, as well as ideas, projects and solutions for all Ukrainian cities, who want to use smart city approach.

Kyiv Smart City Hub will be the place to those, who want to work for the city, to communicate and learn. And those, who in the future, will be part of the smart city movement.

There everyone will find:

  • Smart City School. Trainings, lectures, learning courses and meet ups. And maximum knowledge and expertise from best tutors and experts.

  • Incubator for city projects based on open data. Mentoring, job places, technology solutions and launch.

  • Communication place for cities representatives, authorities and companies, proposing smart city solutions.

  • Informational and expert center.

  • Place for hackathons, meet ups, round tables.

  • Place of innovative urban solutions developing by active public and the IT community.

After Launch

After launch the hub will function as a workspace for all those, who work on projects within Kyiv Smart City. And, of course, as live exhibition and test ground for initiative partners, showcasing their smart city developments and solutions.


After launch hub will function as a workspace for all those, who work on projects within Kyiv Smart City. And, of course, as live exhibition and test ground for initiative partners, showcasing their smart city developments and solutions.

As an Incubator, it will gather startups, working on open data urban services and applications. Each startup will be able to get job places, mentoring, technology solutions and the ability to test and run their project through our partner network..

The Smart City School will also be created as part of the HUB  – a unique project providing maximum knowledge on the “smart cities” subject. Only the best speakers, experts and tutors. And a huge base of knowledge for those who are willing to work for the good of his native city.

And we are going to do it really fast!

We believe that in 3 months Kyiv Smart City Hub will start its operations. And will help to change our native Kyiv forever, spreading smart city solutions all over Ukraine.

Are you in?

Donate!
Share!
Make some noise!

Or just visit Kyiv and enjoy your stay here. Everything is really appreciated. :)

Additional info about our perks!

Every donator will help to create smart Kyiv and also will have unique opportunities to attend closed smart city meetings and events in Ukraine.

Also your name will be engraved on the Fame Wall in the Hub. And if you donate $15 and more, you also will get special brand merchandise pack – magnet, pencil, pen. More money – more great gifts.

Kyiv Smart City would
like to change the capital of Ukraine!

We are Kyiv Smart City – a non-profit initiative, operating in the Ukrainian capital.

We are the main contact point between Kyiv citizens, authorities, activists and city officials. And our main task is to start global changes in the society of our city, create and foster a new culture of communication, promote urban projects creation and define transparency standards for all city life participants.We have been working successfully for over 8 months and during that time we were able to create a smart city infrastructure comparable to several years of work in foreign cities. And we believe that soon Kyiv will become a true smart city.
We are creating the Smart City Hub to enhance and speed up this process.

We believe that this Hub will change our city. And we are developing it using our own resources and at our own expense. That’s why we have started this campaign.
What do we need?

We’ve found a great old place for the Kyiv Smart City Hub and now we are gathering money to renovate it and create minimal working infrastructure. The total renovation budget is $50 000. 


We have already started restoration works with our own money and we are planning to open the Kyiv Smart City Hub in 3 months.
This place is being created by the community for the community. And will be extremely thankful for your help. It is really important for us and the future of the new Kyiv. 
Join us!

story:
India is the 2nd largest cotton producer in the world and 2nd in Global Textiles export. About 8000 chemicals are used to complete one garment from start to finish. Chemicals Dyes are causing heavy pollution in India's rivers, leading to dead fish, barren agricultural lands and infertility in the community.

NADHI in India means river. Named after the cause, we are making clothing that is 100% natural. Our first product launch is the Jabla for infants from 0-3 months. Made from certified organic cotton and traditional dyes extracted from herbs and roots, Nadhi's jablas are light and breezy. Perfect for the summer baby.

What We Need & What You Get

Help me reach my goal of $3000 for my start-up venture. Here is how you can contribute:

  • If you are expecting, then stock up. I make small & unique batches
  • Its a wonderful green gift for a baby shower
  • Take the option of the jablas and the natural soapnuts for a complete start up kit
  • To green your own luandry buy our soapnuts. Reuse your grey water to water plants
  • Buy a donation box at a reduced rate for charity
  • For bulk orders, please mail us to get special rates

The Positive Impact

What happens when you buy organic and natural clothing?

  • From birth, baby is wrapped in the arms of Mother Earth
  • If demand for natural clothing increases, so will supply
  • Organic cotton restores earth and natural dyes do not pollute river water
  • Healthy working conditions for those working from farm to factory
  • No harm for ecosystems and communities nearby production

Risks & Challenges

  • I only source raw materials from Certified or verified suppliers
  • Getting my own business certified is expensive at the start up stage. That's why the certification symbols are missing
  • Cost of production is more expensive than ordinary clothing, yet the product is affordable and you pay the true cost of owning a natural product. Not at the cost of the environment.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Introduce our work to someone who can benefit
  • Get in touch if you would like to start a green business with our products
  • Inform hospitals and clinics that they can go Green in providing healthcare
  • If you want clothing for another age group in any particular style, write to us and we will try our best.

Love from Nature

story:
Grindhaus Brew Lab

Greetings beer friends!


Who We Are

We are Grindhaus Brew Lab- a brewery set to open in Clearwater, FL in 2016 and we cordially invite you to join us on our journey. Grindhaus Brew Lab was hatched by longtime Tampa Bay craft beer ambassadors Robb Larson and Lisa Colburn, along with cohort Tony Vincenti. This same team brought HiFI Homebrew and BBQ Supply to life in 2015 and Grindhaus Brew Lab will be the brewery complement located in the expansive back area of the space.


The Brewery

Grindhaus Brew Lab will be unique. With a B and Cult movie theme, the emphasis is on fun. We take great beer seriously but not ourselves. Plenty of seating will be available in the hip, industrial tasting room. Events- including movie nights, beer tastings, and educational classes will be held throughout the year. 


Our Beers

Besides our core tasty artisanal ales, we'll brew up special edition beers for the seasons and limited releases. Our beers will be full of personality with a focus on quality and drinkability. Barrel aging is something we plan to utilize. 


What We Need

Our goal is to raise $15,000. This will help pay for boring building improvements like plumbing and drainage but also for shiny new brewing toys like the brewing system and fermenters. We’re aiming for at least a 1-3 Barrel electric brewing system to keep 4-8 taps rockin’ out tasty beer. If we are fortunate enough to raise more we’ll put it toward upgrading the tap system, a new video projector for those cult and B films, and other expenses. Our space, the bar, tables & seating, grain mill, fermentation room, sound system, and more are already on-site and paid for.


What You Get

You work hard for your money and we want to offer you some great rewards in appreciation for your contribution, like a free beer for life membership. Being we are opening Grindhaus Brew Labs, which of course brews beer and operate its homebrew counterpart, HiFi Homebrew, we are in a unique position to offer some pretty cool rewards. We value your contribution and want to offer value in return. Check out all the rewards and we hope one or more piques your interest.



The Impact

Grindhaus Brew Lab is about great beer, and more than that- fostering a sense of community that’s often lost in today’s society. We want Grindhaus to be a neighborhood gathering place, comfortable and inviting for local and traveling beer lovers alike, from novice level to aficionado. Beer education is something we take seriously and we aim to promote training through classes of all sorts on beer tasting, beer styles, and beer history. With the craft beer scene in the US going super-size, we prefer to stay small, fresh, and innovative. In our minds that is what craft beer is all about and the soul of this delicious movement.


Other Ways You Can Help

Here are some other ways you can help instead of or in addition to contributing.

  • Tell others about our project- word of mouth goes a long way.

  • Like and share our Facebook and Twitter pages.

  • Lend us a hand, we can always use one.

  • Visit us once we open, we’d love to see you.


Cheers and thanks for your consideration!

The Grindhaus Brew Lab team

story:
The Vault

Remember that fantastic party room that launched at ConVergence 2015? Would you like to see it come back this year? Well, here is your chance to help make that happen, be part of the team, and get some fun perks in the process!

The inhabitants of Vault 131 opened their doors in 2015 to share the unique libations they had spent the last 100 or so years perfecting. This year, that same talented team of entertainers hopes to satisfy your thirsts and entertain your senses in all new ways! But don't fret wastelanders, the atomic blast will most definitely be returning. Running such an awesome party is no easy (or cheap) task, so help make our elaborate dreams for the future a reality!

Some of Vault 131's hopes and dreams:

  • Last year most of our bar supplies were donated; this year we need to invest in our own equipment. Making sure our generally closed habitat remains a minimal waste facility is of the utmost importance to us.
  • After realizing our generators weren't up to last year's challenge, we'll be upgrading our lighting equipment with the newest of power-efficient technologies to provide expert ambience for our honored wasteland visitors.
  • We are painstakingly testing and adjusting our products for maximum desirability to the varied palates of ConVergence's wastelanders. We also are seeking improved methods for dispensing our exceptional creations.
  • Our HVAC system broke down early and is in dire need of repair so that it can handle the demands of all the heat you travelers bring in with you.
  • The area outside of our vault requires attention and Ed needs a better environment to shine in.
  • Security will be heightened with the addition of motion detecting turrets - your safety is our responsibility!
  • And many more tasks and creative improvements will be undertaken as we let our imaginations run wild. The limitations will be dependent upon our funding.

What do you get?

Let's face it; in the post apocalyptic world, nothing (including help) comes for free. So what will you get for your aide, despite our admiration and appreciation? I'm glad you asked:

  • The return of your favorite party room and watering hole!
  • Goodies, ribbons, special privileges, and karma boosts.
  • For the most generous supporters, you can count on the envy and admiration of your peers at your superior social status.
  • Many will leave their legacy behind on the very walls of our vault!
All perks will be sealed into a package with your name on it and available for pickup during open hours. For donors reaching team member status, their packages will be available for pick-up an hour prior to official open.

Please note that donor ribbons and other goodies are only available to friends and team members contributing prior to ConVergence's 2016 kickoff.

Risks & Challenges

There's a lot of work and responsibility when bringing such a party to ConVergence. While almost all of our team members are returning this year, many have to cut back their investment (either fiscally or time-wise). Additionally our budget was slightly off last year due to fee's relating to room damages from our guests.

  • We're positive that with your help we'll be able to return with a bang and be even more impressive than last year!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute money, you can still help the effort:

  • Spread the word!
  • Volunteer as a worker, builder, musician, artist, or teamster.
  • Follow Wheaton's Law while visiting our room: "Don't be a dick."
  • Contact us through Facebook or our team's email: falloutpartyteam@gmail.com
**In the case of any unforseen events that should prevent the party from happening (death of the entire team, atomic blasts, acts of God, cancellation of ConVergence), 100% of funds received will be donated to charity.

story:
What is the Louisiana Midwives Association?

  • We are the professional organization for Louisiana midwives
  • We reformed two years ago and have been working hard with our regulating body on establishing better rules to accompany the 2012 Louisiana Midwifery Act 
  • Your contribution will go directly toward our legislative efforts

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking a minimum of $10,000! This money will go toward our ongoing efforts for better rules for home birth consumers and midwives. The rules that pass this year will predict the future of midwifery access for families as well as the amount of midwives practicing in the state of Louisiana.
  • You can simply donate money without a "perk" and get a lot of love from us!
  • Some of our perks: 1. HUGE discounts on Louisiana midwifery care and home birth. 2. Discounted childbirth education 3. Free doula care or birth photography  4. Herbal teas and care packages for postpartum  5. AND MORE!
  • If we do not reach our goal, the money will still be used to support the Louisiana Midwives Association and our legislative efforts.
The LMA has been strictly funded by it's own members, that is, Louisiana midwives! We have worked hard for two years to help write and pass appropriate midwifery rules that reflect the Midwives Model of Care, and now is the time for help.

story:
What would you do if you found yourself holding the last seeds of a wonderful tomato in your hands?  Would you brush them off on the ground and move on with your day, or would you try to save the plant and keep diversity in the food supply? 

This is where we found ourselves earlier this year.  

We've been growing the Ivan tomato for several years because it was a great tomato with huge production.  It seems to be able to withstand Missouri's weather and pests better than others we have tried. The Ivan tomato has a delicious old fashion favor and a deep meaty structure which does well for fresh tomatoes, canning, and cooking. 

This picture shows you the difference between an Ivan and a grocery store tomato. Which would you rather eat and feed to your family?


We found out that the family who had been growing and selling the Ivan for generations had stopped farming and no longer had any Ivan seeds. We started searching gardening catalogs and asking people about the Ivan.  We found out there were no public sources available for Ivan seeds and that the Ivan had not been in a public catalog since 2011.  With that knowledge, we started The Ivan Tomato Rescue Project. 

 

We are three friends that believe in food supply, heritage heirloom seed preservation, and the healing powers of gardening.  We created a company called Victory Gardeners, and with your help we can save the Ivan Tomato.  To learn more about what we are doing, check out our website at www.victorygardeners.com.  We hope you will support our campaign.

  • Laura Flacks-Narrol: Suburban Gardener, Canning Guru, Mother and Marketing/Business Manager
  • Jordan Casey: Millennial Farmer, Contractor, Idea Dude, Networker and Tomato Grower.
  • Curtis Hess: Millennial Farmer, Contractor, Spokesperson, Tomato Grower and overall Good Soul.

Stage 1) - The Ivan Tomato Rescue Project Initial Seed Launch

  • Grow enough tomatoes and save the seeds to supply the campaign. 
  • Design seed packets, print, fill, and distribute into the hands of gardeners.  
  • Design and supply Ivan shirts, stickers, and aprons to reward our contributors. 
  • Our goal is to supply between 1000 and 1600 seed packets through this campaign.

Stage 2) - Growing Ivan Plant Starts for Sale in the Spring Markets and Supply Seeds to Catalogs and Stores. 

  • With your support we will expand the Ivan production next spring. 
  • We hope to grow upwards of 2000 plants and get them into farmers markets and trade shows. 
  • We will also increasing our seed production to supply seeds to catalogs and commercial sales for the winter of 2016.
  • At this point the Ivan seed will also be stored in several seed banks ensuring it's safety and continuity.  

Stage 3) - Add other endangered and at-risk heirloom varieties to our program and continue to expand food diversity. 


We hope to raise upwards of $10,000 to help us get this venture off the ground. A portion of the funds will be spent on this years efforts of marketing, packaging, distribution, and Indiegogo campaign costs. The rest will be spent on building our plant stock for next spring, and seed stock for the following winter. In order to do this we need many things, including a market booth and greenhouse supplies. 

We will need to build a greenhouse to get the plant starts going for next spring. Lucky for us, Jordan and Curtis are handy guys and have been gathering windows from old construction jobs. We plan to build our green houses with as much recycled supplies as we can. However, even with the best of intentions, we need some materials to make it happen. If you are excited about what we're trying to do, please consider helping us by contributing directly as a Gold or Platinum Greenhouse sponsor.  

Firstly, everyone will receive our heartfelt thanks and the satisfaction of knowing you have contributed to saving the food chain. We appreciate your support, and want you all to know that only together can we make a difference and save this tomato. 

The Seeds:  

  • If you are a gardener, you will want your own package of limited release Ivan seeds.  
  • You can grow them in your backyard or in containers on your porch. Just make sure you have fertile soil and keep it well watered.  
  • You will also be welcomed into the Ivan Tomato Rescue Project Facebook group. Here Ivan growers can share their experiences with the Ivan, including sharing pics of the beauties as they grow.  
  • With every sale of seeds you will also get instructions on how to save seeds so you will be able to grow Ivan's for years to come


Ivan Gear: 

  • Every donor will receive a Ivan Tomato Rescue Project and a Victory Gardeners Sticker.  
  • Ivan T-shirts are available in both V-neck and Crew-neck. The shirts are dark blue and have our Ivan Tomato Rescue Logo as Curtis is wearing in the picture above.
  • Ivan Aprons are available as well. They are red with pockets and have the Ivan Tomato Rescue Logo on it so you can proudly support the future of the food supply while you make your favorite foods. 
  • Side note: All our Ivan Gear is printed here in Columbia Missouri by Local print shop One to One Print Shop.  They are great people and are doing all they can to help our campaign succeed .    Shout out to...      


Recognition and Shout Outs:
  • For certain levels of support you can get shout outs on social media, your name on a plaque outside the greenhouse, or a blog post dedicated to yourself, your cause, or your company. Check out the Perks for details. 
We appreciate all levels of support and especially would appreciate it if you would share our videos and posts on social media. This is very easy to do and makes all the difference in the world to getting the word out about this great tomato and this great cause.  


There is one more aspect of our campaign that you should know about. We believe that gardening is healing. The family that originated the Ivan believed this as well, and their farm was a home for agriculture therapy, helping veterans and those with PTSD find healing and balance in their lives.  We are continuing this good work by donating 10% of the proceeds of this campaign to programs that offer agricultural therapy.  

These programs will help those with stress-related illnesses, including veterans returning from service. It is estimated that 20% of those returning from active duty will have PTSD and only 50% of those will seek care. We feel that through working the soil one can begin the process of bringing one's soul back into balance and healing the self.   Help us help others to heal themselves through the therapeutic power of gardening. 

In order to implement our plan of working towards saving the Ivan, we need to meet our goal. However, if we surpass our goal we will be in a position to do some serious good.  

  • We will be able to expand our reach with the Ivan, growing more starts and saving more seeds for distribution. 
  • We will be able to supply free seeds and starts to community and school gardeners, allowing many to grow and experience the strength of the Ivan tomato. 
  • We will be able to add other endangered produce strains to our lineup of plant offerings. 
  • We will be able to support more agricultural therapy programs, spreading the healing power of gardening. 
So here is our commitment: As each stretch goal is reached we will commit to the following:
$15,000 - we will give away seeds and starts to up to 25 community gardens.  
$20,000 - we will add the Nepalese Bell to our growing program for this summer, helping to expand the reach of this rare and wonderful pepper.  
$25,000 - we will provide seed or starts for up to 25 K-12 school based gardening programs. 
We want to do as much good as possible and build a viable business based on saving rare and endangered produce varieties. Please help us and support our campaign. 

Help us save the food chain, one tomato at a time.  

Your contributions to our campaign are going to help heal the planet, the food chain, and those in need. This is the Ivan Rescue Project. We are Victory Gardeners and we are thankful for your support.
story_txt:
What would you do if you found yourself holding the last seeds of a wonderful tomato in your hands?  Would you brush them off on the ground and move on with your day, or would you try to save the plant and keep diversity in the food supply? 
This is where we found ourselves earlier this year.  

We've been growing the Ivan tomato for several years because it was a great tomato with huge production.  It seems to be able to withstand Missouri's weather and pests better than others we have tried. The Ivan tomato has a delicious old fashion favor and a deep meaty structure which does well for fresh tomatoes, canning, and cooking. 
This picture shows you the difference between an Ivan and a grocery store tomato. Which would you rather eat and feed to your family?



We found out that the family who had been growing and selling the Ivan for generations had stopped farming and no longer had any Ivan seeds. We started searching gardening catalogs and asking people about the Ivan.  We found out there were no public sources available for Ivan seeds and that the Ivan had not been in a public catalog since 2011.  With that knowledge, we started The Ivan Tomato Rescue Project. 

 
We are three friends that believe in food supply, heritage heirloom seed preservation, and the healing powers of gardening.  We created a company called Victory Gardeners, and with your help we can save the Ivan Tomato.  To learn more about what we are doing, check out our website at www.victorygardeners.com.  We hope you will support our campaign.


Laura Flacks-Narrol: Suburban Gardener, Canning Guru, Mother and Marketing/Business Manager


Jordan Casey: Millennial Farmer, Contractor, Idea Dude, Networker and Tomato Grower.


Curtis Hess: Millennial Farmer, Contractor, Spokesperson, Tomato Grower and overall Good Soul.











Stage
1) - The Ivan Tomato Rescue Project Initial Seed Launch

Grow enough tomatoes and save
     the seeds to supply the campaign. 
Design seed packets, print,
     fill, and distribute into the hands of gardeners.  
Design and supply Ivan shirts,
     stickers, and aprons to reward our contributors. 
Our goal is to supply between
     1000 and 1600 seed packets through this campaign.


Stage
2) - Growing Ivan Plant Starts for Sale in the Spring Markets and Supply Seeds
to Catalogs and Stores. 

With your support we will
     expand the Ivan production next spring. 
We hope to grow upwards of 2000
     plants and get them into farmers markets and trade shows. 
We will also increasing our
     seed production to supply seeds to catalogs and commercial sales for the
     winter of 2016.
At this point the Ivan seed
     will also be stored in several seed banks ensuring it's safety and
     continuity.  

Stage
3) - Add other endangered and at-risk heirloom varieties to our program and
continue to expand food diversity. 


We hope to raise upwards of $10,000 to help us get this venture off the ground. A portion of the funds will be spent on this years efforts of marketing, packaging, distribution, and Indiegogo campaign costs. The rest will be spent on building our plant stock for next spring, and seed stock for the following winter. In order to do this we need many things, including a market booth and greenhouse supplies. 



We will need to build a greenhouse to get the plant starts going for next spring. Lucky for us, Jordan and Curtis are handy guys and have been gathering windows from old construction jobs. We plan to build our green houses with as much recycled supplies as we can. However, even with the best of intentions, we need some materials to make it happen. If you are excited about what we're trying to do, please consider helping us by contributing directly as a Gold or Platinum Greenhouse sponsor.  

Firstly, everyone will receive our heartfelt thanks and the satisfaction of knowing you have contributed to saving the food chain. We appreciate your support, and want you all to know that only together can we make a difference and save this tomato.

If
     you are a gardener, you will want your own package of limited release Ivan
     seeds.  
You
     can grow them in your backyard or in containers on your porch. Just make
     sure you have fertile soil and keep it well watered.  
You
     will also be welcomed into the Ivan Tomato Rescue Project Facebook group.
     Here Ivan growers can share their experiences with the Ivan, including
     sharing pics of the beauties as they grow.  
With
every sale of seeds you will also get instructions on how to save seeds so you
will be able to grow Ivan's for years to come

Every donor will receive a Ivan Tomato Rescue Project and a Victory Gardeners Sticker.

Ivan Aprons are available as well. They are red with pockets and have the Ivan Tomato Rescue Logo on it so you can proudly support the future of the food supply while you make your favorite foods.

These programs will help those with stress-related illnesses, including veterans returning from service. It is estimated that 20% of those returning from active duty will have PTSD and only 50% of those will seek care. We feel that through working the soil one can begin the process of bringing one's soul back into balance and healing the self.   Help us help others to heal themselves through the therapeutic power of gardening.

story:
Short Summary

My name is David Williams, I am 30 and have been in the moving industry for nearly 4 years.

I spent my first year working for a large moving company here in Auckland, during that time I was disgusted with the way customers were treated as cash machines, there was no heart; I am a great believer in people before profit. 

while working there I was caring for my father who was ill, I also moved many elderly people, and familys who are a huge amount of stress during the move, the industry standard seemed to be 'not my problem'.

my father passed away which was a huge blow to me, I decided I could do a better job looking after customers and employees, I wanted to be a light in a dark industry.

I named the company with my dad in mind, having the family name would push me, its one of the reasons ive worked so hard and gone without so my dream can come to fruition.

What We Need & What You Get

We need $50,000 to achieve the following.

  • compete on google against the giants with deep pockets, it can cost up to $14 per click on google, something small guys like me cannot afford
  • set up container storage: storage is needed more and more in our over crowded city, yet it is extremely expensive, we want to change that.
  • Employ more people: currently I have a small team. I am very aware that their familys rely on the work i can provide, there are so many people unemployed who would do anything for a job, I want to train them and turn them into proud citizens, contributing to the economy.
  • Become a relieable household name. this is the biggest challenge, it is going to take great marketing and most of all trust, my companys reputation is already fantastic, but only in small circles. I want to blow away more and more people, I want to change their minds regarding my industry.

The Impact

The impact of your contribution will be huge, helping the elderly is very personal to me, they are the great generation, we owe them our lives. your contribution will mean they will have a smooth friendly service moving to the next stage of their lives, not feeling intimidated or worrying about their belongings.

you will be providing jobs and security, and a huge change for my city, you will also be helping me show the big guys that it really is about people. the profit will follow. 

Risks & Challenges

My biggest challenge is marketing, it is expensive, I can provide the great service, people just need to know about it.

there are heaps of guys buying ugly trucks and going out there to do substandard jobs, my challenge is to build a clean tidy, sustainable business amoungst all this competition. I have no doubt i can achieve this, I wont give up till i do

Other Ways You Can Help

spread the word! let your friends know about my campaign, I'm not sitting around with my hand out, I'm working 7 days a week, all the hours god can give! help out someone who's trying to do something magical.

story:
What is Be Well Nashville?

Be Well Nashville, LLC, is a health and wellness store opening in January 2016. The idea for our store has slowly developed over the last several years. My journey began many years ago as I searched for answers to my long list of health problems. While traditional doctors were unable to get to the root of my issues, the natural healing community came to my rescue! It was love at first sight! A lot has happened in the last few years which has led me to finally making one of my dreams come true and opening a place where people can come learn, be empowered, and have access to quality nutritional products. Be Well Nashville will be much more than just a retail store. It will be a place where  people can learn more about their bodies and health and support each other on their journeys to better eating, living and thinking. Having someone with my knowledge and personal experiences will give an added bonus to visiting the store. My goal is to offer HOPE to those struggling, to educate those who wish to learn and to bring awareness to the community for healthy living. Be Well Nashville will open in late January, 2016 and will be located in the Shoppes on Fatherland, Suite 104, in the booming historical district of East Nashville.


What We Need & What You Get

We will be starting with an empty 400 sq foot space so painting will be our first priority. We will be using BEHR's premium paint. This is a low & zero VOC paint for improved air quality and reduced toxins released by traditional paints.

We will need to purchase product shelves, a check out counter, furniture and retail POS equipment, as well as a small refrigerator for our probiotics and fish oils. We have an adorable outdoor patio we will furnish for an area where folks can come and read or just sit and share their story.  The store will be stocked with high quality, super pure nutritional supplements and herbal products, as well as protein powders, essential oils, organic coconut oil, organic feminine products, personal development/health books, music therapy CD's,  children's supplements and a couple of products for our furry family members, too! We will be looking for furniture for our indoor sitting area that will allow for folks to come read a book from our learning corner or share a cup of tea with a friend.

We will be purchasing wooden folding chairs for our weekly and monthly wellness classes. We will offer 8 week Wellness Wednesday classes, as well as Tuesday Talks led by myself and other local health practitioners. 

We realize that our campaign amount may not allow for everything but will allow us to get started with some of the basics and add on from there as we begin to grow!

If we raise more than our goal then we will use it  to go ahead and update our website where folks living out of town can shop our quality products and attend webinars to learn more about living well!

THANK YOU so much for supporting our project and spreading the word! Everyone who donates will receive a complimentary e-copy of my Be Well nutritional guidebook!

You can just donate whatever amount you would like or choose one of our Perk options which include various items such as an e-copy or hard copy of Dr. Leslie's Be Well book, promotional shaker cups, organic cotton tote bags, T-Shirts and mini wellness sessions with Dr. Leslie! You may also purchase any additional Perks (t-shirts, shaker cups and tote bags) by contacting us through our Facebook page, Be Well Nashville.    *See pictures of the Perks at the bottom of the page!!

With much gratitude and blessings of health,

The Be Well Nashville Team

www.bewellnash.com

Who is on the Be Well Team?

Leslie Shew, PhD, CTN - "Doc"

Owner, entrepreneur, teacher, mentor.  Dr. Leslie spent 16 years teaching high school kids before going into natural health. She is a board certified Traditional Naturopath and holds a PhD in Natural Health Sciences. Just a few of her areas of specialty are nutrition, intestinal health, adrenal fatigue, anxiety, metabolic health and brain health for those struggling with ADD/ADHD or those looking for anti-aging solutions. Doc will be at the store to help assist you with your wellness needs. She will also be leading weekly health classes for community education, IN.FORM wellness classes and more! As of now, she will continue individual client sessions on a part time basis. 


Michael Shew, M.Ed  - "Shewdogg"

Co-owner, motivator, husband, best friend and biggest fan! As a retired athletic trainer, Michael has a background in Sports Medicine where he met Dr. Leslie while working as a sports trainer with the athletes at the high school where she use to teach.  Look for Shewdogg on the weekends helping out around the store or hanging out with their fur babies, Sara & Morley!

Michael and Leslie have live in Nashville with their two rescue pups! Each love the outdoors and enjoy biking, hiking, skiing and paddle boarding. They are fairly new to the East Nashville community and love it!


Paula Swift -  IN.FORM Coach.

Paula's passion is to serve others in taking that first step towards good health and disease prevention.  As a cancer conquerer, she discovered and learned first hand the impact of modern lifestyle in connection with our health.  Wellness and disease prevention became a passionate focus as she now pursues a new path in personal and corporate wellness with a focus on energy and overall lifestyle. Paula will be leading her own wellness classes and helping out at the store from time to time. 
Other Services:
Dr. Michael Buczynski and Dr. Callie Gant will be at the store one day a week offering Cold Laser Treatments and Kinesio Taping for those suffering from injuries and joint pain. Find out more about Cold Laser Therapy at www.artofhealthchiro.com

How can you help?

• Enter the amount you would wish to donate or select a donation with Perk option.

• Enter your email or log on with your Facebook account.

• Pay by credit card or debit card.

• Share this page with friends and family or through social media!

*Be sure to LIKE our Be Well Nashville Facebook page and Instagram!  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • If you're local and want to find ways to help just message us on our Facebook page and we will let you know where we need an extra hand. I'm sure there will be a painting party....or two!
  • Start living and sharing the Be Well movement!

And that's all there is to it.

Perk Pics:  (The color on the tote bag will be more like the color on our logo vs what you see and T-shirt photo coming soon!)

Enjoy an e-copy or hard copy of Dr. Leslie's guidebook to wellness!



Organic Cotton Be Well Nashville Tote Bag! Perfect for carrying your protein shake, water bottle and towel to the gym or for a quick run to the farmer's market!

A great way to take your protein on the go! The top has a place for your protein powder and the wire shaker ball helps to stir up your protein just right!


LOVE our sports shirts!! The top is the men's shirt and the bottom shows the slight difference in our women's design! Great for yoga or a work out at the gym! Inspire others to BE WELL!



Intro Video done by Danny Coleman of East Nashville! 

Music: "Happy Chances" by Nicolai Heidlas

story:
Welcome to La Cazihita Hostel!

La Cazihita Hostel was born from the adveturer spirit of a typical family in the Colombian Andes. We have created a hostel in a place where this type of lodging was unknown, that was part of the challenge! Now we are part of our guest's traveling stories. The purpose of La Cazihita Hostel is turning guests in friends and the hostel in their house. That´s why we are are commited to improve our services.

What makes the Hostel so special?

That´s a great question! You would have to imagine a place located only three hours far from Bogotá-Colombia in the Department of Boyacá particularly in the city of Sogamoso known as the city of Sun and Steel. Our hostel is just right for:

  • Getting to know the second largest lake in Latin America at 3015mts above sea level called Lake Tota, the only one with a natural white sand beach. 

  •  Going for a long trekking along the Paramo where endemic Frailejones such as "Donkey ears" grow in several crystal water sources. It´s also home for Andean Condor, if we are lucky maybe we can look at its wings´ shadow. (Colombia holds the 60% of the entire Paramo ecosystem on earth).

  • Leave your boots on! You still need to see the second largest waterfall in Colombia, Candelas waterfall. This time in a warmer climate passing through a path full with lush vegetation.  
  • Visiting little picturesque towns. Enchanting places where you can find wine, wool, fruits, balls, bakery, churches, museums, arte, restaurants and all souvenirs you can think of, all hand made!

When you arrive to our Hostel, you´ll feel in a traditional and friendly house with four clean and comfortable rooms. Places for socializing and relaxing, including WIFI, hot showers, towels, parking lot, kitchenware and the best personnel always at your service

By the way! TRIPADVISOR has accredited us as the 10th best hostel in Colombia this year! ¡How not to celebrate by improving even more!

                                                 

Our Community

This is one of our favourite parts! From the beginning we have had in mind the handicrafts made in our community, particulary those including the expert and hard working hands of neighbour women head of family, who learnt knitting the wonderful knitwear exhibited on the walls and cabinets in the hostel. We are also looking for new young artists that see in our hostel their first gallery for paintings and sculptures so guests can appreciate them. For being the first hostel in town we have prepared young people to see in tourism an opportunity and a way of life. We feel proud for providing jobs to people in our community. 

By the way, our hostel takes its name as CAZIHITA given that ZIHITA means FROG in Muisca language. In fact, Muisca was the native indigenous community that we come from and feel proud of. Frog means fertility and progress.

Where will funds go?

Our needs are clear and we are certain that we can meet them with your help.
  • Lengthen the kitchen. Because our guests love cooking.
  • Enlarge glass cabinets. So we can include more items made in the community.
  • Set up a bathroom for handicapped. It is important for us to adapt our facilities for them.
  • Roof Repair. Due to the traditional construction, made with rustic materials, we want to do preventive maintenance and some repair.
  • Water pressure. For convenience in showers and water saving, we will change the reserve water container.
  • Private bathroom. Our guests require this service in one room.
  • New bedroom to increase lodging capacity.
  • Solar panels. Because we are an enviromentally responsible hostel.
(Please  check at the end of the video for more details)


What is the reward?

Paramo people $10 USD

We will baptize with your name one the Frailejones in the Ocetá paramo and send you an online postcard. You will feel part of the biggest natural factory of water! 

                


The Frog 

Receive by post a 20cm coal carved Frog (ZIHITA) figure. Hand made by young artists in a town called Topaga. This frog is a replica of a frog found in the archeological museum of Sogamoso representing progress and fertility for the indigenous Muisca community we are part of.

The Soccer ball 

 Receive by post a (decorative) leather soccer ball hand made and sewn by the artisans in a town called Mongui. Each ball is printed with the Colombian flag next to yours! 

The Frog and Soccer ball 

Receive by post a 20cm coal carved  Frog (ZIHITA) figure and a  leather soccer ball handmade and sewn by the artisans in a town called Mongui is printed with the Colombian flag next to yours!


Cazihita Guest 

Three nights accomodation for one person in our hostel and a tour to Tota´s lake, Paramo Ocetá and surrounding towns. Includes breakfast, our coal carved frog figure and soccer ball. 

Cazihita Guest X2 

Three nights accomodation for two people in our hostel and a tour to Tota´s lake, Paramo Ocetá and surrounding towns. Includes breakfast, our coal carved frog figure and soccer ball.

Cazihita Guest X2 Extra 

Three nights accomodation for two people in our hostel and a tour to Tota´s lake, Paramo Ocetá and surrounding towns. Includes breakfast, our coal carved frog figure and soccer ball. Also, private trasportation Bogota-Sogamoso-Bogotá. 

Cacique 

You will be declared a honorary founder of the renewed La Cazihita Hostel, your name will be carved in our water fountain with the Frog. Three nights accomodation for two people in our hostel and a tour to Tota´s lake, Paramo Ocetá and surrounding towns. Includes breakfast, our coal carved frog figure and soccer ball. Also, private trasportation Bogota-Sogamoso-Bogotá.

Thanks for your help!

Giving us the opportunity of sharing our hostel and the enchanting destinations surrounding us, it is not only a great a pleasure but also great help. Each collected dollar in this Indiegogo campaign will be turned into confort for our guests and lodging improvement. We would like our relationship to cross the internet frontiers to shake hands, have a coffee and start a new trip in La Cazihita Hostel. Thanks in the name of our community, the Colombian Paramo and La Cazihita Hostel!

The Family of La Cazihita Hostel

Blanca and Miguel. The hosts that take care of every single detail at the Hostel. The are parents of the Araque Torres family. Highly dedicated to hospitality sector, they are commited to offering comfort and well-being to our guests.

Leonardo. He is the strategist of technology and innovation. The oldest son in the family . He is in charge of keeping all web services in operation for bookings and information display. He is always seeking for new ways of improving our services.

Diego. He is in charge of sales and marketing. The second son of the family. He is a people person, charismatic and helpful, he is commited to solving all doubts of travelers interested in visiting us. Not only handles all contact with travelers but he is also an outstanding guide.

Margarita . She is the hostel´s english interpreter. The youngest daugther, in charge of facilitating communication with our english speaking guests. She is also an expert traveller.
